trans-unit.source: Displays data in a customizable grid.
trans-unit.target: Viser data i et egendefinerte rutenett.

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessible client applications when a new cell becomes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Varsler tilgjengelig klientprogrammer når en ny celle blir gjeldende cellen.

trans-unit.source: This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload twice using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden konverterer angitte rad- og indeksene i `objectID` og `childID` parametere og kall den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>metoden overbelaste to ganger med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>verdiene i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityNotifyClients%28System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1.
trans-unit.target: Den `objectID` og `childID` bestemmes av nummerering bare synlige rader og kolonner i sine visningsrekkefølgen telle rad- eller kolonneoverskrifter hvis de er synlig, og Start med 1.

trans-unit.source: For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kolonneoverskrifter er synlig, for eksempel den `objectID` for den første synlige annen raden er 2.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> indicating the row and column indexes of the new current cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som angir rad- og indeksene i den nye gjeldende cellen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property of cellAddress is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1. -or- The value of the property of cellAddress is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <> *> for cellAddress er mindre enn 0 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1. - eller - verdien for den <> *> for cellAddress er mindre enn 0 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> for a column header cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that is currently being painted.
trans-unit.target: Justerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> for en kolonne hodet cellen i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som er for øyeblikket malt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the borders for the column header cells.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen internt kaller AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle-metode for å finne utseendet til kantlinjene for kolonner hodet celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen brukes vanligvis verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen for den `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that that represents the column header border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som som representerer kolonneoverskriften kantlinje stil for å endre.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the column header border style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som brukes til å lagre mellomliggende endringer kantlinjestilen kolonner hodet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is currently being painted is in the first column displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt er i den første kolonnen vises på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is currently being painted is in the last column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt er i den siste kolonnen i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som har den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*>-egenskapen satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style for the current column header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjestil for gjeldende kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style for the upper-left cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kantlinjestilen for øvre venstre celle i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The upper-left cell is the cell that is shared by the column header row and the row header column.
trans-unit.target: Øvre venstre cellen er cellen som deles av overskriftsraden kolonne og rad overskrift-kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> gets the value of this property while painting the upper-left cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>henter verdien for denne egenskapen under maler øvre venstre cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the border of the upper-left cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på kantlinjen på øvre venstre celle i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kantlinjestilen cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedCellBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: Bruk AdvancedCellBorderStyle-egenskapen til å tilpasse utseendet til celler, kantlinjer.

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre linjestilen for kantlinjer ved hjelp av de innebygde stilene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjestilen cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the column header cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kantlinjestilen på kolonnen hodet celler den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of column header cells' borders.
trans-unit.target: Bruk AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle-egenskapen til å tilpasse utseendet til kolonner hodet celler kantlinjer.

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre linjestilen for kantlinjer ved hjelp av de innebygde stilene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjestilen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref> objekter i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the row header cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kantlinjestilen radverdiene hodet celler den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle property to customize the appearance of row header cells' borders in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle til å tilpasse utseendet til rad-overskriftsceller kantlinjer i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To change the style of the borders using the built-in styles, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre linjestilen for kantlinjer ved hjelp av de innebygde stilene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjestilen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref> objekter i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the option to add rows is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om mulighet til å legge til rader vises for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to add rows if both this property and the data source's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er bundet til data, brukeren som er tillatt å legge til rader Hvis både egenskapen og datakildens <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskap er satt til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the add-row option is displayed to the user; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Legg til rad-alternativet vises for brukeren; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to delete rows from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan slette rader fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the user is allowed to delete rows if both this property and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er bundet til data, brukeren har tillatelse til å slette rader Hvis begge egenskapen og <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskap er satt til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can delete rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren kan slette rader. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the AllowUserToDeleteRowsChanged property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for egenskapen AllowUserToDeleteRowsChanged endres.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual column repositioning is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om manuell kolonnen flytte er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position.
trans-unit.target: Når kolonnen flytte er aktivert, kan brukere dra en kolonneoverskrift til en ny plassering.

trans-unit.source: Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at låst og ikke-frosne kolonnene danner to atskilte grupper. brukere kan flytte kolonner i en gruppe, men kan ikke flytte en kolonne fra en gruppe til den andre.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen støtter ikke doble bufring.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>er satt til `true` i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll brukere får ikke visuelle tilbakemeldinger når endring rader, kolonner eller hode, eller når omorganisering av kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can change the column order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren kan endre kolonnerekkefølgen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToOrderColumns*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize columns.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukere kan endre størrelsen på kolonnene.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å forhindre brukere fra å endre kolonnebredde manuelt.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig, for eksempel med kolonner som viser bare der dataene er lastet inn én gang, og kolonner endrer størrelse på dette tidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om endring av bruker i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen støtter ikke doble bufring.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>er satt til `true` i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll brukere får ikke visuelle tilbakemeldinger når endring rader, kolonner eller hode, eller når omorganisering av kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if users can resize columns; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukere kan endre størrelsen på kolonnene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize rows.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukere kan endre størrelse på rader.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent users from manually changing row heights.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen for å hindre at brukere manuelt endrer rad.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, with display-only controls where data is loaded once and rows are resized at that time.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig, for eksempel med bare vise kontroller der dataene er lastet inn én gang, og rader endrer størrelse på dette tidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Cellestilen som gjelder for cellen må ha en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> for celleinnholdet brytes på flere linjer når en rad endrer størrelse

trans-unit.source: For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om endring av bruker i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>er satt til `true` i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll brukere får ikke visuelle tilbakemeldinger når endring rader, kolonner eller hode, eller når omorganisering av kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardstilen celle brukes ulik nummererte radene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Viser cellene ved hjelp av stiler som er angitt av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen som arver stiler fra andre egenskaper av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> for kontrollen</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: For cellene i rader med et ulikt tall for indeksen overstyre stiler som er angitt i egenskapen AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle stiler angitt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, og av stiler angitt ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Under henting av denne egenskapen en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med standard verdier opprettes hvis egenskapen ikke har allerede blitt åpnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til en innvirkning på ytelsen ved henting av denne egenskapen for mange rader.

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Når det er mulig å bruke én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>å angi denne egenskapen for flere rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> skal brukes for ulik nummererte radene.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen er satt til en ny verdi eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>er satt til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med minst én egenskapsverdi forskjellig fra tidligere celle stil objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether all the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cells are currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om alle de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> celler for øyeblikket er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection does not perform efficiently with large selections.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>samlingen utfører ikke ta med store valg.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> have been selected before you access the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection, check the return value of the AreAllCellsSelected method.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut om alle cellene i de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>har blitt valgt før du har tilgang til innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>samling, kontroller returverdien for metoden AreAllCellsSelected.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, this method can cause rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan imidlertid føre til radene blir delt.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> performance, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>ytelse, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the rows and columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*> property values of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ta med rader og kolonner med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*>egenskapsverdiene for <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all cells (or all visible cells) are selected or if there are no cells (or no visible cells); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis alle cellene (eller alle synlige celler) er merket, eller hvis det er ingen cellene (eller noen synlige celler); Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns are created automatically when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kolonner opprettes automatisk når den <> </> *> eller <> </> *> egenskapene er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are set or changed.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnene genereres automatisk når denne egenskapen er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>egenskapene er angitt eller endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Columns can also be automatically generated when the AutoGenerateColumns property is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Kolonner kan også genereres automatisk når egenskapen AutoGenerateColumns er satt er endret fra `false` til `true`.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `true` og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>endres slik at det er kolonner som ikke samsvarer med kolonnene i den forrige <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>verdi, data i kolonnene uten forkastes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> properties are not set.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen ignoreres hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>Egenskaper er ikke angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When AutoGenerateColumns is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når AutoGenerateColumns er satt er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen genererer én kolonne for hver offentlige egenskap objekter i datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the bound objects implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bundne objektene implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>grensesnittet kontrollen genererer én kolonne for hver egenskap som er returnert av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents.
trans-unit.target: Hver kolonneoverskrift inneholder verdien for egenskapen kolonnen representerer.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property but set AutoGenerateColumns to `false`, you must add columns manually.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>egenskap satt men AutoGenerateColumns er satt til `false`, du må legge til kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects.
trans-unit.target: Du kan binde hver kolonne som er lagt til til datakilden ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen til navnet på en egenskap eksponert av bundne objektene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the AutoGenerateColumns property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Innstillingen av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>i Windows Forms Designer angir automatisk egenskapen AutoGenerateColumns er satt til `false` og genererer kode for å legge til og binde en kolonne for hver egenskap i datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Koden som genereres ved utformingen tilsvarer lagt til manuelt koden vises i følgende eksempel.

trans-unit.source: It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the AutoGenerateColumns property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke det samme som automatisk generering av kolonner i kjøretid som oppstår når egenskapen AutoGenerateColumns er satt er satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the columns should be created automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kolonnene må opprettes automatisk. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the AutoGenerateColumnsChanged property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for egenskapen AutoGenerateColumnsChanged endres.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Justerer bredden på den angitte kolonnen til å tilpasse innholdet i alle cellene, inkludert hodet cellen.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når en kolonne endrer størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnebredden justeres bare én gang per metodekall; Hvis innholdet i kolonnen senere endrer, kolonne vil ikke automatisk justere.

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på alle kolonner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at kolonnen skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endres, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>egenskapen eller kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen skal endre størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall kolonner minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: Justerer bredden på den angitte kolonnen bruker angitt størrelse-modus.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når en kolonne endrer størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnebredden justeres bare én gang per metodekall; Hvis innholdet i kolonnen senere endrer, kolonne vil ikke automatisk justere.

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på alle kolonner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at kolonnen skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endres, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>egenskapen eller kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten lar deg angi en skalering modus beregner nye bredden basert på verdier i et begrenset antall celler, for eksempel de som finnes i vises rader.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette forbedrer ytelsen når kontrollen inneholder et stort antall rader.

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen skal endre størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that row heights will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: Justerer bredden på den angitte kolonnen bruker angitt størrelse-modus, beregning eventuelt bredden med forventningen at justeres senere rad.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når en kolonne endrer størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnebredden justeres bare én gang per metodekall; Hvis innholdet i kolonnen senere endrer, kolonne vil ikke automatisk justere.

trans-unit.source: To resize all columns, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på alle kolonner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at kolonnen skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endres, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>egenskapen eller kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten lar deg angi en skalering modus beregner nye bredden basert på verdier i et begrenset antall celler, for eksempel de som finnes i vises rader.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette forbedrer ytelsen når kontrollen inneholder et stort antall rader.

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten er beskyttet, og som gjør det mulig for ideelle celle bredde og høyde forhold i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `fixedHeight` er `false`, kolonnebredden beregnes med forventningen som du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>metoden neste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to resize.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å beregne nye bredden basert på gjeldende rad; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å beregne bredden med forventningen at justeres også i rad.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit the contents of the largest column header.
trans-unit.target: Justerer høyden på kolonneoverskriftene for å tilpasse innholdet i den største kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når kolonneoverskriftene endrer størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på kolonneoverskriftene justeres bare én gang per metodekall; Hvis innholdet i kolonnen overskrifter senere endrer, kolonne-hodene vil justere ikke automatisk.

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi kolonneoverskriftene skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endrer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: For celleinnholdet brytes på flere linjer når kolonneoverskriftene skaleres må cellestilen som gjelder for cellen ha en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Justerer høyden på kolonneoverskriftene basert på endringer i innholdet i hodet i den angitte kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når kolonneoverskriftene endrer størrelse på Hvis bare innholdet i hodet i den angitte kolonnen er endret som et resultat av brukerredigeringene eller endringer til en bundet datakilde.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på kolonneoverskriftene er justert bare én gang per metodekall Hvis innhold endringen krever. Hvis innholdet i kolonnen overskrifter senere endrer, kolonne-hodene vil justere ikke automatisk.

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi kolonneoverskriftene skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endrer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: For celleinnholdet brytes på flere linjer når kolonneoverskriftene skaleres må cellestilen som gjelder for cellen ha en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the header with the changed content.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen som inneholder overskriften med endrede innholdet.

trans-unit.target: columnIndexer ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall kolonner minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit their contents, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: Justerer høyden på kolonneoverskriftene for å tilpasses innholdet beregning eventuelt høyden med forventningen at justeres senere kolonne og/eller rad overskrift breddene.

trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når kolonneoverskriftene endrer størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på kolonneoverskriftene justeres bare én gang per metodekall; Hvis innholdet i kolonnen overskrifter senere endrer, kolonne-hodene vil justere ikke automatisk.

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi kolonneoverskriftene skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endrer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten er beskyttet, og som gjør det mulig for ideelle celle bredde og høyde forhold i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnsWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> next.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å beregne nye høyden basert på gjeldende bredde for radoverskriftene; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å beregne høyden med forventningen at justeres også rad overskrifter bredde.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new height based on the current column widths; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the height with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust.

trans-unit.source: To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi kolonneoverskriftene skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endrer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på en bestemt kolonne, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi kolonnene som skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endrer ved bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>egenskapen eller kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten lar deg angi en skalering modus beregner nye breddene basert på verdier i et begrenset antall celler, for eksempel de som finnes i vises rader.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette forbedrer ytelsen når kontrollen inneholder et stort antall rader.

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnsMode has the value and is .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnsModehas the value and is .

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnsMode has the value or .
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnsModehas the value or .

trans-unit.source: autoSizeColumnsMode is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnsModeer ikke et gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of all columns using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the widths with the expectation that row heights will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: Justerer bredden på alle kolonnene som er angitt størrelse-modus, beregning eventuelt bredder med forventningen at justeres senere rad.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når kolonner endrer størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnebredden justeres bare én gang per metodekall; Hvis innholdet i kolonner senere endrer, kolonner blir ikke automatisk justere.

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på en bestemt kolonne, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi kolonnene som skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endrer ved bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>egenskapen eller kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten lar deg angi en skalering modus beregner nye breddene basert på verdier i et begrenset antall celler, for eksempel de som finnes i vises rader.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette forbedrer ytelsen når kontrollen inneholder et stort antall rader.

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten er beskyttet, og som gjør det mulig for ideelle celle bredde og høyde forhold i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column widths will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `fixedHeight` er `false`, kolonnen beregnes med forventningen som du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>metoden neste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new widths based on the current row heights; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the widths with the expectation that the row heights will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å beregne de nye breddene basert på gjeldende rad; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å beregne bredder med forventningen at justeres også i rad.

trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnsModehas the value or .

trans-unit.target: autoSizeColumnsModeer ikke et gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the specified row to fit the contents of all its cells including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Justerer høyden på den angitte raden skal tilpasse innholdet i alle cellene inkludert hodet cellen.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a row resizes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når en rad endrer størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The row height is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row later change, the row will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Radhøyden justeres bare én gang per metodekall; Hvis innholdet i raden senere endrer, raden vil ikke automatisk justere.

trans-unit.source: To resize all rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på alle rader, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the row to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi at raden skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endres, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Cellestilen som gjelder for cellen må ha en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> for celleinnholdet brytes på flere linjer når en rad endrer størrelse

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som skal endre størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: Justerer bredden på radoverskriftene basert på endringer i innholdet i hodet i den angitte raden og bruker angitt størrelse-modus.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når radoverskriftene endrer størrelse på Hvis bare innholdet i hodet i den angitte raden har endret som et resultat av brukerredigeringene eller endringer til en bundet datakilde.

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på radoverskriftene er justert bare én gang per metodekall Hvis innhold endringen krever. Hvis innholdet i raden overskrifter senere endrer, rad overskrifter vil justere ikke automatisk.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten er beskyttet, og som gjør det mulig for ideelle celle bredde og høyde forhold i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` eller `fixedRowsHeight` parametere `false`, bredde for radoverskriftene beregnes med forventningen at du vil kalle metoder som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>Neste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new width based on the current height of the column headers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the width with the expectation that the height of the column headers will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å beregne nye bredden basert på gjeldende høyden på kolonneoverskriftene; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å beregne bredden med forventningen at justeres også høyden på kolonneoverskriftene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new width based on the current row heights; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the width with the expectation that the row heights will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å beregne nye bredden basert på gjeldende rad; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å beregne bredden med forventningen at justeres også i rad.

trans-unit.source: rowHeadersWidthSizeMode has the value or .
trans-unit.target: rowHeadersWidthSizeModehas the value or .

trans-unit.source: rowHeadersWidthSizeMode is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: rowHeadersWidthSizeModeer ikke et gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: Justerer bredden på radoverskriftene basert på endringer innholdet i hodet i den angitte raden og bruker angitt størrelse-modus, beregning eventuelt bredden med forventningen at justeres senere rad-og/eller kolonnen hodet breddene.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når radoverskriftene endrer størrelse på Hvis bare innholdet i hodet i den angitte raden har endret som et resultat av brukerredigeringene eller endringer til en bundet datakilde.

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på radoverskriftene er justert bare én gang per metodekall Hvis innhold endringen krever. Hvis innholdet i raden overskrifter senere endrer, rad overskrifter vil justere ikke automatisk.

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi radoverskriftene skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endrer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan du angi en skalering modus beregner nye bredden basert på verdier i et begrenset antall overskriftene, for eksempel de som finnes i vises rader.

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette forbedrer ytelsen når kontrollen inneholder et stort antall rader.

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten er beskyttet, og som gjør det mulig for ideelle celle bredde og høyde forhold i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.target: Hvis den `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` eller `fixedRowHeight` parametere `false`, bredde for radoverskriftene beregnes med forventningen at du vil kalle metoder som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>Neste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>

trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the header with the changed content.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som inneholder overskriften med endrede innholdet.
