trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of all rows to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.
trans-unit.target: Justerer høyde for alle radene etter innholdet i alle cellene, inkludert hodet celler.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere når rader endrer størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: Rad justeres bare én gang per metodekall; Hvis innholdet i radene senere endrer, rader vil ikke automatisk justere.

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på en bestemt rad, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: To resize a subset of rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på et delsett av rader, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>overbelaste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi rader som skal skaleres automatisk på nytt når innholdet endres, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Cellestilen som gjelder for cellen må ha en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> for celleinnholdet brytes på flere linjer når en rad endrer størrelse

trans-unit.source: To resize all rows, use a different overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method.

trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten er beskyttet, og som gjør det mulig for ideelle celle bredde og høyde forhold i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `fixedWidth` parameteren er `false`, i rad beregnes med forventningen som du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>metoden neste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om programmatisk endring i [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the first row to resize.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i den første raden skal endre størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to resize.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som skal endre størrelse på.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to calculate the new heights based on the current column widths; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to calculate the heights with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å beregne de nye høydene basert på gjeldende kolonnebredden; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å beregne nivå med forventningen at justeres også kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how column widths are determined.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan kolonnebredde fastsettes.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen lar deg konfigurere kontrollen slik at kolonnebredde justeres automatisk å fylle kontrollen eller passer celleinnholdet.

trans-unit.source: Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsesjusteringer inntreffe om Fyll modus når bredden på kontrollen endres.

trans-unit.source: In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, whenever row heights change.
trans-unit.target: I innhold basert skalering modusene størrelsesjusteringer skje når celleinnholdet endring, eller hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>er aktivert, når rad endrer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: Noen modi som er basert på innholdet skalering til å begrense størrelsen justeringen for viste radene for å øke ytelse.

trans-unit.source: To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre størrelse-modus for en individuell kolonne ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property value from the control.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>, som angir at kolonnen arver virkemåten og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>egenskapsverdien fra kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode>

trans-unit.source: Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Kolonner i Fyll modus dividere tilgjengelig kontrollen bredden i forhold som er angitt av sin <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>egenskapsverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Bredden som er tilgjengelige for Fyll modus fastsettes ved å trekke bredden på alle kolonner fra bredden på klienten for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If this width is smaller than the combined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne bredden er mindre enn den kombinerte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>verdier for alle kolonnene i Fyll-modus, vises det vannrette rullefeltet alle fyll modus kolonner vises med minimum bredden og endring av bruker-kolonnen er deaktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om kolonnen Fyll modus [kolonnen Fyll modus i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Only columns with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: Bare kolonner med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>egenskapsverdi for `true` skaleres automatisk, og endre synligheten for en kolonne ikke endring forekomme.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Når kolonner er satt til skaleres automatisk på nytt, kan brukeren også justere kolonnebredde med musen.

trans-unit.source: To adjust column widths programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> methods or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil justere kolonnebredde programmatisk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>metoder eller sett kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om innhold basert størrelse automatisk [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref>, column headers are hidden, and at least one visible column has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref>. -or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"></xref> and at least one visible column with an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode*> property value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"></xref> is frozen.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref>kolonneoverskrifter er skjult og minst én synlige kolonnen har en <> </> *> egenskapsverdi for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref>. - eller - den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode"> </xref> og minst én synlige kolonnen med en <> </> *> egenskapsverdi for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode"> </xref> er låst.

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode*>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how row heights are determined.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan rad fastsettes.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen lar deg konfigurere kontrollen slik at rad automatisk tilpasses innholdet når innholdet endres.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>er aktivert, rad justeres også når kolonnebredde endrer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: Noen skalering modi til å begrense størrelsen justeringen for viste radene for å øke ytelse.

trans-unit.source: Only rows with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: Bare rader med et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>egenskapsverdi for `true` skaleres automatisk, og endre synligheten for en rad ikke endring forekomme.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Når radene er satt til skaleres automatisk på nytt, kan brukeren også justere rad med musen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>verdien for en automatisk størrelse rad beregnes ved oppsett å kompensere for skriftstørrelsen som brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>, you should retrieve the value in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of in the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Å hente riktig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>, må du hente verdien i skjemaet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>hendelsen i stedet for i skjemaet konstruktør.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust row heights programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> methods, or set the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil justere rad programmatisk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>metoder eller sett raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Cellestilen som gjelder for cellen må ha en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> for celleinnholdet brytes på flere linjer når en rad endrer størrelse

trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om innhold basert størrelse automatisk [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Puts the current cell in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Setter gjeldende celle i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `false` Hvis cellen kan ikke angi redigeringsmodus, som kan skje for en rekke årsaker.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `false` Hvis gjeldende celle er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: It also returns `false` if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> interface.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer også `false` Hvis cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>egenskapen `null` (det vil si cellen kan ikke være vert for en kontroll for redigering av) og celle-typen implementerer ikke det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell supports editing, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit> event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen støtter redigering, denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit>som kan avbrytes, og returnerer `false` Hvis hendelsesbehandling avbryter Rediger</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit>

trans-unit.source: If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis endringer ikke er avbrutt og cellen kan være vert for en kontroll for redigering av denne metoden initialiserer kontrollen og viser den.

trans-unit.source: If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis initialiseringen mislykkes, metoden returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen angir ble redigeringsmodus, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select all the cell's contents; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to not select any contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge alle celleinnholdet; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> velge ikke noe innhold.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is already in edit mode or successfully enters edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjeldende celle er allerede i redigeringsmodus, eller angir ble redigeringsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*> is not set to a valid cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>er ikke satt til en gyldig celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: -or- This method was called in a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: - eller - denne metoden ble kalt i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The type indicated by the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not derive from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> type. -or- The type indicated by the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Typen som er angitt av cellen <> </> *> egenskapen er ikke avledet fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> type. - eller - type som er angitt av cellens <> </> *> egenskapen implementerer ikke den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialisering av redigering celleverdien mislyktes og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjestil for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen påvirker ytre kantlinjen på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To set the style of the cell borders, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en stil for cellekantlinjene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels edit mode for the currently selected cell and discards any changes.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er i modus for virtuelle endringene trer i kraft i datahurtigbufferen for på nivå cellen som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The CancelRowEdit event can be used when implementing row-level transactions.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CancelRowEdit kan brukes når implementering radnivå transaksjoner.

trans-unit.source: If the CellBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen CellBorderStyle er satt til noe annet enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>egenskapen må være en systemfarge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the cell border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi denne egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>verdi som er en skrivebeskyttet verdi som indikerer at celle kantlinjestilen er tilpasset ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the cells contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerer kantlinjestilen på cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kantlinjestilen til en celle endres.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en del av en celle klikkes.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en del av en celle, inkludert kantlinjer og utfylling.

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key.
trans-unit.target: Den oppstår også når brukeren trykker nøkkelen plass mens en for celle eller merket celle har fokus oppstår to ganger for slike cellen hvis cellen klikkes under trykker mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut når celleinnholdet klikket, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>

trans-unit.source: This event does not receive information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen mottar ikke informasjon om posisjon for musen.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hendelsesbehandlingen trenger informasjon om posisjon for musen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event instead.
trans-unit.target: For Klikk i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>denne hendelsen oppstår før endringene merket verdi, slik at hvis du ikke vil beregne forventet verdi basert på gjeldende verdi, du håndterer vanligvis av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne hendelsen oppstår bare når brukerdefinert verdi er utført, som vanligvis forekommer når fokus forlater celle, og du må også håndtere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: I dette behandlingsprogrammet Hvis gjeldende celle er en avmerkingsboks-celle, kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når innholdet i en celle klikkes.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the cell content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når celleinnholdet klikkes.

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: Den oppstår også når brukeren trykker og slipper mellomrom under celleegenskaper knappen eller merket celle har fokus og oppstår to ganger for slike celle om celleinnholdet klikkes ved å trykke mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: Use this event to detect button clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> or link clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne hendelsen til å oppdage knappen klikker for et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>eller -klikk koblingen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event instead.
trans-unit.target: For Klikk i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>denne hendelsen oppstår før endringene merket verdi, slik at hvis du ikke vil beregne forventet verdi basert på gjeldende verdi, du håndterer vanligvis av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne hendelsen oppstår bare når brukerdefinert verdi er utført, som vanligvis forekommer når fokus forlater celle, og du må også håndtere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: I dette behandlingsprogrammet Hvis gjeldende celle er en avmerkingsboks-celle, kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en celle hurtigmenyen kreves.

trans-unit.source: The CellContextMenuStripNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CellContextMenuStripNeeded inntreffer bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>-egenskap er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: Når du håndtere hendelsen CellContextMenuStripNeeded, hurtigmenyen som du angir i behandlingsprogrammet vises når brukeren høyreklikker en celle.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du vil vise en hurtigmeny avhenger av den gjeldende tilstanden eller verdien til en celle.

trans-unit.source: The CellContextMenuStripNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CellContextMenuStripNeeded oppstår også når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen hentes, enten programmatisk eller når brukeren høyreklikker en celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>Egenskaper for å fastsette tilstanden eller verdien til en celle, og bruke denne informasjonen til å endre eller endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er initialisert med verdien i cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskapen hendelsen overstyre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Behandle CellContextMenuStripNeeded hendelsen når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser stille cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>verdien for flere celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi hurtigmenyer for individuell rader i stedet for å individuell cells ved å angi raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskap eller behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the CellContextMenuStripNeeded event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>overstyrer raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen og hendelsen CellContextMenuStripNeeded overstyrer både den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>hendelsen og raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid angi `null` for en celle hurtigmeny å hindre at en rad hurtigmeny overstyres.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks anywhere in a cell.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren dobbeltklikker hvor som helst i en celle.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når redigerer modus stopper for den valgte cellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current cell changes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or when the control receives input focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjeldende celle endres i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontroll eller når kontrollen får inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan oppstå to ganger for ett enkelt klikk Hvis kontrollen ikke har inndata fokus og klikker cellen var ikke tidligere gjeldende celle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*> property of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*>-egenskapen til en celle endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en celle feilteksten er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: The CellErrorTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CellErrorTextNeeded inntreffer bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>-egenskap er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Handling the CellErrorTextNeeded event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av hendelsen CellErrorTextNeeded er nyttig når du vil finne feil for en celle avhengig av verdien eller tilstand.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellErrorTextNeeded event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A> property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Når du behandle CellErrorTextNeeded-hendelsen og angi feilteksten i behandlingsprogrammet, symbol en feil vises i cellen med mindre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A>er satt til `false` eller cellen redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren flytter pekeren over tegnet feil, vises feilteksten i et verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: The CellErrorTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CellErrorTextNeeded oppstår også når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen hentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>til å fastsette tilstanden eller verdien til en celle, og bruke denne informasjonen til å endre eller endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er initialisert med verdien i cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>egenskapen hendelsen overstyre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellErrorTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Behandle CellErrorTextNeeded hendelsen når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser stille cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>verdien for flere celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår når innholdet i en celle må formateres for visning.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen vil prøve å konvertere en celleverdi til et format som passer for visning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell.
trans-unit.target: Det kan for eksempel konvertere en numerisk verdi til en streng for visning i en tekst for celle.

trans-unit.source: You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kan du angi formatering convention skal brukes ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>ble returnert av egenskaper for eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the CellFormattingevent.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ikke tilstrekkelig standard formatering, kan du tilpasse formateringen ved behandling av CellFormattingevent.

trans-unit.source: This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan du angi den nøyaktige verdien, i tillegg til cellestiler, for eksempel bakgrunns- og farge, for celle visningen.

trans-unit.source: This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at du kan håndtere denne hendelsen for alle typer formatering, uavhengig om celleverdien selve må formatering.

trans-unit.source: The CellFormatting event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: Den CellFormatting inntreffer hver gang hver celle males, slik at du kan unngå lang behandling under behandling av denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår også når cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>hentes eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellFormatting event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Når du håndterer hendelsen CellFormatting den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er initialisert med celleverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir egendefinert konvertering fra celleverdien Vis-verdien, angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å konvertere verdien, slik at den nye verdien er av typen som er angitt av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å angi at det kreves ingen ytterligere verdi formatering, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når hendelsesbehandlingen er fullført, hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er `null` eller er ikke av riktig type eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>er formatert med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Egenskaper for cellestilen returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen som er initialisert med cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uavhengig av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen, visningsegenskapene for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen brukes til å gjengi cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the CellFormatting event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om egendefinerte formatering ved hjelp av hendelsen CellFormatting [slik: tilpasse formatering i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil unngå bestemmelser ytelsen ved behandling av denne hendelsen, få tilgang til cellen via parameterne for hendelsesbehandlingen i stedet for å få direkte tilgang til cellen.

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse konvertering av en formatert, brukerdefinert verdi til en faktiske celleverdien, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en celle mister inndata fokus og er ikke lenger gjeldende celle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker hvor som helst på en celle med musen.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker med noen av museknappen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å fastslå som ble brukt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: For å finne ut Klikk på innholdet i en celle, for eksempel en knapp eller kobling i en celle, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>

trans-unit.source: The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen mottar kolonneindeks og radindeks av pekeren posisjon for musen.

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event instead.
trans-unit.target: For Klikk i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>denne hendelsen oppstår før endringene merket verdi, slik at hvis du ikke vil beregne forventet verdi basert på gjeldende verdi, du håndterer vanligvis av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>hendelsen i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne hendelsen oppstår bare når brukerdefinert verdi er utført, som vanligvis oppstår når fokus forlater celle, og du må også håndtere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: I dette behandlingsprogrammet Hvis gjeldende celle er en avmerkingsboks-celle, kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a mouse button while over a cell.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren slipper museknappen over en celle.

trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren slipper noen av museknappen.
