trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en celle skal tegnes.

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan håndtere denne hendelsen til å tilpasse utseendet til cellene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to paint other parts.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fargemerknader hele celler selv eller paint bestemte deler av cellene og bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoder for å fargemerknader i andre deler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>klassen for å fargemerknader standard kontroller ved hjelp av gjeldende tema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [gjengivelse kontroller med visuelle stiler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], du har også tilgang til et stort bibliotek for standard bilder som du kan bruke med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Under behandling av denne hendelsen, bør du tilgang til cellen via parameterne for hendelsesbehandlingen, stedet få direkte tilgang til cellen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en celle forlater redigeringsmodus Hvis celleverdien er endret.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen vil forsøke å konvertere en brukerdefinert verdi som vises i en celle til en faktisk underliggende celleverdi i typen som er angitt av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringen bruker formatering egenskaper for cellestilen returnert av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the CellParsing event to provide custom value conversion to the required type.
trans-unit.target: Hvis standard konverteringen ikke oppfyller dine behov, kan du behandle CellParsing-hendelsen for å angi egendefinert verdi konvertering til den obligatoriske typen.

trans-unit.source: Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: Brukerne kan angi redigeringsmodus ved hjelp av metoden som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>egenskapen og kan la redigeringsmodus, under lagring av endringer til en celle ved å flytte til en annen celle eller ved å trykke ENTER.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the CellParsing event will not occur.
trans-unit.target: Når du trykker ESC reverseres endringer for verdien før den er lagret, og CellParsing hendelsen skjer ikke.

trans-unit.source: The CellParsing event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CellParsing oppstår hvis celleverdien er faktisk endret, selv om den siste verdien er lik den opprinnelige verdien.

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Den oppstår også når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellParsing event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: Når du håndtere hendelsen CellParsing, kan du konvertere verdien selv, eller du kan tilpasse standard konvertering.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du konvertere verdien selv med cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>metode med typen konverteringsprogrammer velger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt la standardtype analysere verdien konverteringsprogrammer, men du kan endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>egenskapene for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen som er initialisert med cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du konvertere verdien selv, erstatter innledende, formatert verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen med den konverterte verdien i type som er angitt av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å angi at ytterligere analyse kreves, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: Når hendelsesbehandlingen er fullført, hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er `null` eller er ikke av riktig type eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>analyseres cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>metode med standard typen konverteringsprogrammer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av denne metoden analyserer verdi ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Egenskaper for cellestil som er sendt inn</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien ikke er lik <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, verdien analyseres ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>egenskapen og typen konverteringsprogrammer som er sendt inn</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse konvertering av en celleverdi til en formatert verdi for visning, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en celle tilstand endres, for eksempel når cellen mister eller får fokus.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*> property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new value or when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returnert av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er satt til en ny verdi eller når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med minst én egenskapsverdi forskjellig fra tidligere celle stil objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en av verdiene i en cellestil endres.

trans-unit.source: The CellStyleContentChanged event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the CellStyleContentChanged event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: CellStyleContentChanged hendelsen oppstår når en egenskapsverdi for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>objektet som ble returnert av en av følgende egenskaper endringer:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Hvis én av disse egenskapene er satt til en annen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, men den tilsvarende *PropertyName* `Changed` inntreffer, men hendelsen CellStyleContentChanged finnes ikke.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).
trans-unit.target: For rad-, kolonne- og egenskaper for navnet på den *PropertyName* `Changed` hendelsen begynner med "`Row`","`Column`", eller "`Cell`" (for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*> property value changes for a cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>egenskapsendringer verdien for et element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en celle Verktøytipsteksten kreves.

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CellToolTipTextNeeded inntreffer bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>-egenskap er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når du håndtere hendelsen CellToolTipTextNeeded, Verktøytipsteksten du angir i behandlingsprogrammet vises når musepekeren holdes over en celle, og kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>egenskapsverdi `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CellToolTipTextNeeded er nyttig når du vil vise verktøytips som er angitt av den gjeldende tilstanden eller verdien til en celle.

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen CellToolTipTextNeeded oppstår også når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen hentes, enten programmatisk eller når musepekeren kommer inn en celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>Egenskaper for å fastsette tilstanden eller verdien til en celle, og bruke denne informasjonen til å endre eller endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er initialisert med verdien i cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>egenskapen hendelsen overstyre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Behandle CellToolTipTextNeeded hendelsen når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser stille cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>verdien for flere celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når cellen er ferdig med å validere.

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av denne hendelsen er nyttig for etter validering behandling av celleverdien.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en celle mister inndata fokus, aktivere innhold validering.

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du avbryter denne hendelsen annullerer endringene i gjeldende celle.

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Når denne hendelsen avbrytes i databindingselementer modus, overføres ikke den nye verdien til den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Når denne hendelsen er avbrutt i virtuelle modus i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>hendelsen vil ikke opp.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to perform post-validation processing.
trans-unit.target: Behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>-hendelsen for å utføre validering av etter behandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien til en celle endres.

trans-unit.source: The CellValueChanged event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: CellValueChanged hendelsen oppstår når brukerdefinert-verdi som er lagret, som vanligvis forekommer når fokus forlater cellen.

trans-unit.source: In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er merket celler imidlertid vil du vanligvis behandle endringen umiddelbart.

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil lagre endringen når cellen klikkes, må du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: I et behandlingsprogram Hvis gjeldende celle er en avmerkingsboks-celle, kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og pass i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed.
trans-unit.target: Rader i kontrollen er ikke sortert automatisk når en celleverdi endres.

trans-unit.source: To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a CellValueChanged event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sortere kontrollen når brukeren endrer en celle, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>metoden i en CellValueChanged hendelsesbehandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> krever en verdi for en celle for å formatere og vise cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne hendelsen virtuelle modusen til å fylle celler med data fra et egendefinert datalager uten at rader blir delt.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om virtuelle modus [virtuelle modus i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: For å legge til brukerdefinerte verdier egendefinerte datalageret, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> og en celleverdi er endret krever lagring i den underliggende datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne hendelsen i virtuelle modus for å oppdatere et egendefinert datalager brukerangitte data.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control.
trans-unit.target: Behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>-hendelsen for å hente verdier fra datakilden for visning i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om virtuelle modus [virtuelle modus i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner gjeldende utvalg av unselecting alle de merkede cellene.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, each column and row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden, hver kolonne- og Rads <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter merkingen for alle merkede cellene unntatt det som er angitt, eventuelt slik at den angitte cellen er valgt.

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header.
trans-unit.target: En `rowIndexException` verdien-1 representerer en kolonneoverskrift og en `columnIndexException` verdien-1 representerer en radoverskrift.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig for å fjerne gjeldende utvalg uten å oppheve valget av cellen, raden eller kolonnen som er angitt av unntak-indekser.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapsverdien tillater individuelle Cellevalg, denne metoden angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A>for hver celle til `false`, unntatt cellen i rad- og kolonnen som er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapsverdien tillater fullstendig rad- eller utvalg, denne metoden også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>for hver rad- eller til `false`, unntatt raden eller kolonnen som inneholder den angitte cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Utelatte cellen, raden eller kolonnen kan eller ikke kan være i den valgte tilstanden når denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden merker hvis den `selectExceptionElement` parameterverdien er `true`.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av valgmodus, kan hele raden eller kolonnen også være merket som et resultat.

trans-unit.source: The column index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneindeks som skal utelates.

trans-unit.source: The row index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen som skal utelates.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the excluded cell, row, or column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to retain its original state.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge utelatte cellen, raden eller kolonnen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å beholde den opprinnelige tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: columnIndexException is greater than the highest column index.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexExceptioner større enn den høyeste kolonneindeksen.

trans-unit.source: -or- columnIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, columnIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - eller - columnIndexException er mindre enn-1 når er ; ellers columnIndexException er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is greater than the highest row index.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndexException er større enn den høyeste radindeksen.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, rowIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndexException er mindre enn-1 når er ; ellers rowIndexException er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref> and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukere kan kopiere teksten celleverdiene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref> og om rad- og toppteksten er inkludert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen kopierer Tekstrepresentasjonen av alle merkede cellene til utklippstavlen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er celleverdien konverteres til en streng eller for bildet celler, verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Values are copied to the Clipboard in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> formats.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene kopiert til utklippstavlen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue>Formater.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>

trans-unit.source: These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Disse formatene brukes til å lime inn innhold i programmer, for eksempel Notisblokk [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], og [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen overfører cellene i det minste rektanglet som inkluderer alle de merkede cellene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data.
trans-unit.target: Rader og kolonner som ikke inneholder noen merkede cellene representeres ikke i kopierte data.

trans-unit.source: Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders.
trans-unit.target: Umerket celler i gjenværende rader og kolonner representeres av tomme plassholdere.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av copy-modus og valgmodusen kan hodeverdier for kopierte rader og kolonner kopieres også.

trans-unit.source: When users copy content, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Når brukere kopiere innhold, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen legger til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>til utklippstavlen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This data object is retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette dataobjektet hentes fra det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Når du vil legge til data-objekt til utklippstavlen programmatisk, kan du kalle denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>metoden henter verdier for individuelle celler ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre ett av eller begge av disse metodene i avledede klasser tilpasse oppsettet for kopierte cellene eller for å støtte flere formater.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om utklippstavleoperasjoner og datoformater, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column is added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en kolonne legges til i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antallet kolonner som vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the ColumnCount property to 0 will remove all columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen antall kolonner til 0, fjernes alle kolonnene fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If ColumnCount is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis antall kolonner er tilbakestilt til en verdi mindre enn den gjeldende verdien, kolonnene fjernes fra slutten av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If ColumnCount is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis antall kolonner er satt til en verdi større enn den gjeldende verdien, kolonner legges til slutten av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan bare brukes med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>til å opprette en enkel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>for visning og redigering av tekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner som vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName*>egenskapen for en kolonne endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName*>

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>egenskapen for en kolonne endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen for en kolonne er satt til en ny verdi, eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>for en kolonne er satt til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med minst én egenskapsverdi forskjellig fra tidligere celle stil objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren dobbeltklikker skillelinjen mellom to kolonnene.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å tilpasse størrelse automatisk problemet som oppstår når en bruker dobbeltklikker skillelinjen en kolonne.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel håndtere denne hendelsen for å endre størrelsen på kolonnene som er basert på innholdet i rader som er synlige programmatisk unngå innvirkning på ytelsen med standard virkemåte når du arbeider med et stort antall rader.

trans-unit.source: The column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>egenskapen utvider ikke området som en bruker kan dobbeltklikke.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bredden på en skillelinjen har økt ved å bruke denne egenskapen, vil denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren dobbeltklikker grense mellom skillelinjen og den tilstøtende kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style applied to the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter kantlinjestilen brukes til kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ColumnHeadersBorderStyle settes til noe annet enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>egenskapen må være en systemfarge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi denne egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>verdi som er en skrivebeskyttet verdi som indikerer at kantlinjestilen er tilpasset ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis visuelle stiler er aktivert for applikasjonen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>egenskapen `true`, kolonneoverskriftene er malt ved hjelp av gjeldende tema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is ignored for all column headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet ignoreres verdien for egenskapen ColumnHeadersBorderStyle for alle kolonneoverskrifter bortsett fra de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, som oppsettet ikke er brukt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default column header style.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardstilen for kolonne-hodet.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>| These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.

| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen trans-unit.source: To force column headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: Tvinge kolonneoverskrifter å arve <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>verdier, må du angi verdiene i ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle-objektet til standardverdiene som er angitt for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om celle stil arv [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme and the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis visuelle stiler er aktivert og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>er satt til `true`, alle hodet celler bortsett fra de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>er malt ved hjelp av gjeldende tema og ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle ignoreres verdiene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the default column header style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer standardstilen for kolonne-hodet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen er satt til en ny verdi eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>er satt til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med minst én egenskapsverdi forskjellig fra tidligere celle stil objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the column headers row
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på overskrifter rad i piksler

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the row that contains the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på raden som inneholder kolonneoverskriftene i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The default is 23.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 23.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum height of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum height of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn minimumshøyden for 4 piksler eller større enn den maksimale høyden på 32768 piksler.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om høyden på kolonneoverskriftene justeres og det kan justeres av brukeren eller justeres automatisk for å tilpasse innholdet i hodene.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>, the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>, ikke er mulig å justere høyden på kolonneoverskriftene av brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil justere høyden på kolonneoverskriftene programmatisk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>metoden eller sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi skalering-modus for radoverskriftene ved bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: For celleinnholdet brytes på flere linjer når kolonneoverskriftene skaleres må cellestilen som gjelder for cellen ha en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hodet skalering [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen støtter ikke doble bufring.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>er satt til `true` i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll brukere får ikke visuelle tilbakemeldinger når endring rader, kolonner eller hode, eller når omorganisering av kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref> value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"> </xref> verdi som angir høyden på overskrifter rad kan justeres modus.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeadersVisible property is `false`, a column whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true` can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking with the mouse cursor anywhere along the right border of the column to be resized.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ColumnHeadersVisible `false`, en kolonne der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>er satt til `true` kan fremdeles endres i brukergrensesnittet (UI) ved å klikke med pekeren hvor som helst langs høyre kant for kolonnen skal skaleres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the value of one of the following column properties changes for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in the control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når verdien av en av følgende egenskaper for kolonne endres en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>kontrollens:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>For mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser, kan du se [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>
