trans-unit.source: Commits changes in the current cell to the data cache without ending edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Utfører endringer i den gjeldende cellen datahurtigbufferen uten å avslutte redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden forsøker å konvertere formatert, brukerdefinert verdi til datatypen underliggende cellen.

trans-unit.source: To do this, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>som du kan behandle tilpasse typekonvertering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, default type converters are used.
trans-unit.target: Standard typen konverteringsprogrammer, ellers brukes.

trans-unit.source: Conversion errors may result in an exception if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event is not handled to prevent it.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringsfeil kan føre til et unntak hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>hendelsen behandles ikke for å forhindre det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event for non-data-bound cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er konvertert, den er lagret i dataene lagre opprettet av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>hendelse for ikke-databundet cells når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapsverdi `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: If the value is successfully committed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er lagret i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>inntreffer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the context in which an error can occur.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> verdier som angir konteksten som kan oppstå en feil.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changes were committed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis endringene ble lagret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke skrive celleverdien, og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt objekt som er tilgjengelig for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> that can be cast to type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>som kan endres til typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property to initialize its value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>til å initialisere verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: En tom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den aktive cellen.

trans-unit.source: When you set a cell as the current cell, it will scroll into view if it is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en celle som gjeldende celle, vil den Bla til visningen hvis det ikke vises.

trans-unit.source: The current cell cannot be a header cell, a disabled cell, or a cell in a hidden row or column.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende celle kan ikke være en topptekstcelle, celleegenskaper deaktivert eller en celle i skjulte rader og kolonner.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `null` to temporarily remove the focus rectangle, but when the control receives focus and the value of this property is `null`, it is automatically set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til `null` midlertidig fjerner Fokusrektangelet, men når kontrollen får fokus og verdien for denne egenskapen er `null`, settes den automatisk med verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FirstDisplayedCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Når du endrer verdien for denne egenskapen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>inntreffer før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event handler accessing the CurrentCell property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>Hendelsesbehandlingen tilgang til egenskapen CurrentCell nå får den forrige verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to an external data source, this property is reset to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Når du binder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>til en ekstern datakilde denne egenskapen er tilbakestilt til standardverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that represents the current cell, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no current cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som representerer gjeldende celle eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det er ingen gjeldende celle.

trans-unit.source: The default is the first cell in the first column or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard er den første cellen i den første kolonnen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det finnes ingen celler i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because changes to the current cell cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen kan ikke angis fordi endringer i gjeldende celle ikke kan iverksatt eller avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified cell when setting this property is in a hidden row or column.
trans-unit.target: - eller den angitte cellen når du setter denne egenskapen er skjult rader og kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Re-entrant calling is only allowed when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: RE-entrant kaller tillates bare når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> er bundet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Re-entrant calling results from a change to the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: RE-entrant kaller resultat av en endring i de underliggende dataene.

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property is not in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte cellen når du angir denne egenskapen er ikke i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter rad- og indeksene i den aktive cellen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the row and column of the current cell without accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å fastslå raden og kolonnen i den gjeldende cellen uten direkte tilgang til cellen.

trans-unit.source: This is useful to avoid unsharing shared rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for å unngå unsharing delt rader.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som representerer rad- og indeksene i den aktive cellen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of a cell changes in relation to a change in its contents.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når tilstanden til en celle endres i forhold til en endring i innholdet.

trans-unit.source: A cell is marked as modified if its contents have changed but the change has not been saved.
trans-unit.target: En celle er merket som endret hvis innholdet er endret, men endringen har ikke blitt lagret.

trans-unit.source: This event typically occurs when a cell has been edited but the change has not been committed to the data cache, or when an edit operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår vanligvis når en celle er redigert ikke men endringen er lagret i hurtigbufferen for dataene, eller når en redigeringsoperasjonen er avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row containing the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter raden som inneholder gjeldende celle.

trans-unit.source: To change the current row, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to a cell in the desired row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre gjeldende rad, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapen til en celle i raden ønsket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that represents the row containing the current cell, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no current cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer raden med den gjeldende cellen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det er ingen gjeldende celle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a data-binding operation has finished.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en databinding operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the contents of the data source change or when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når innholdet i dataene datakilden endring eller når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful, for example, to programmatically resize rows and columns based on content updates.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av denne hendelsen er nyttig, for eksempel programmatisk endre størrelse på rader og kolonner som er basert på innholdet oppdateringer.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an external data-parsing or validation operation throws an exception, or when an attempt to commit data to a data source fails.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en ekstern analyse av data eller validering operasjon oppstår det et unntak, eller når et forsøk på å skrive data til en datakilde mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: The DataError event enables you to handle exceptions thrown in code that is called by the control during data processing operations.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen DataError kan du behandle unntak i koden som kalles av kontrollen under behandling av operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs> object associated with this event normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs>objektet som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen vanligvis angi cellen der datafeilen oppstod.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Når feilen forekommer i en ekstern datakilde, men kan datakilden ikke angi kolonnen av feil.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>egenskapen tyder vanligvis på kolonnen i den gjeldende cellen gangen til denne feilen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the list or table in the data source for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på listen eller tabellen i datakilden som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> viser dataene.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er nyttige ved binding til en datakilde som inneholder flere lister eller tabeller.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to set this property when binding to a data source that contains a single list or table.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å angi denne egenskapen ved binding til en datakilde som inneholder en enkelt liste eller en tabell.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains a single table without setting this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel binde en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>styre til en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>som inneholder én enkelt tabell uten å angi denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains multiple tables, however, you must set this property to the name of one of the tables.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>inneholder flere tabeller, men du må sette denne egenskapen til navnet på én av tabellene.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The name of the table or list in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på tabellen eller i det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> viser dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in the data source and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feilen i datakilden, og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is displaying data for.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datakilden som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> viser dataene for.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class supports the standard Windows Forms data-binding model.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>klassen støtter standard Windows Forms-databinding modellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This means the data source can be of any type that implements one of the following interfaces: - The <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface, including one-dimensional arrays.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at datakilden kan være av en annen type som implementerer én av følgende grensesnitt: - <xref:System.Collections.IList>grensesnittet, inkludert endimensjonal matriser.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, such as the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and <xref:System.Data.DataSet> classes.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>Grensesnitt som den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>og <xref:System.Data.DataSet>klasser.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> class.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>Grensesnittet, for eksempel <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>Grensesnittet, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: For specific examples, see the Example section and the task table at the end of this section.
trans-unit.target: Se delen eksempel og tabellen på slutten av denne delen for bestemte eksempler.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will bind to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component and bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to another data source or populate it with business objects.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis du skal bindes til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>komponent og binde den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>sekundkomponenten til en annen data kilde- eller fylle med business-objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component is the preferred data source because it can bind to a wide variety of data sources and can resolve many data binding issues automatically.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>komponenten er foretrukket datakilden fordi det kan binde til en lang rekke datakilder, og at du kan løse problemer med bindingen mange data automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A> property to a string that specifies the list or table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Binding til en datakilde som inneholder flere lister eller tabeller, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>egenskapen til en streng som angir listen eller tabellen ikke binde til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component that contains multiple lists or tables, however, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component instead.
trans-unit.target: Ved binding til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>komponent som inneholder flere lister eller tabeller, men du kan angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>komponenten i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an object collection rather than to database data, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` rather than using the default value of <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, which is appropriate for database data.
trans-unit.target: Ved binding til en objektsamling i stedet for dataene i databasen, vil du vanligvis angis av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen `null` i stedet for å bruke standardverdien for <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, som er riktig for dataene i databasen.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [visning av dataene i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following table provides direct links to common tasks related to the DataSource property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor inneholder direkte koblinger til vanlige oppgaver relatert til egenskapen DataSource.

trans-unit.source: See [Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)and [How to: Bind Objects to Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se [gjennomgang: oppretter et overordnet/detaljert-skjema med to Windows Forms DataGridView Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)og [slik: binde objekter til Windows Forms DataGridView Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that contains data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som inneholder data for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> skal vises.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in the data source and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feilen i datakilden, og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style to be applied to the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> if no other cell style properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardstilen cellen som skal brukes cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> Hvis ingen andre stil celleegenskaper er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Viser cellene ved hjelp av stiler som er angitt av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen som arver stiler fra andre egenskaper av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> for kontrollen</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the DefaultCellStyle property affect all cells except when overridden by the styles specified through the following properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Stiler som er angitt i egenskapen DefaultCellStyle påvirker alle celler bortsett fra når overstyres av stiler angitt ved hjelp av følgende egenskaper:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>For mer informasjon, kan du se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Under henting av denne egenskapen en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med standard verdier opprettes hvis egenskapen ikke har allerede blitt åpnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til en innvirkning på ytelsen ved henting av denne egenskapen for mange rader.

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Når det er mulig å bruke én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>å angi denne egenskapen for flere rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes som standard.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property are set to new values or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>-egenskap er satt til nye verdier eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>er satt til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med minst én egenskapsverdi forskjellig fra tidligere celle stil objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default initial size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den første standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the initial size of the control, which is 240 pixels wide by 150 pixels high.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer den opprinnelige størrelsen på kontrollen, 240 x bred 150 piksler høy.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren skriver inn raden for nye poster slik at den kan være fylt med standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan du fylle inn raden for nye poster når brukeren skriver inn raden.

trans-unit.source: Initial values for the row come from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> returned by each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Startverdiene for raden kommer fra det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>returnert av hver kolonne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source.
trans-unit.target: I data bundne modus celle alle verdier for data bundne kolonner som er lagret i den eksterne datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the DefaultValuesNeeded event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren skriver inn raden for nye poster, opprettes en ny rad i datakilden før hendelsen DefaultValuesNeeded forekommer.

trans-unit.source: When you populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når du fylle ut den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen i hendelsesbehandlingen, verdiene som er lagt til direkte til datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store.
trans-unit.target: I virtuelle modus når denne hendelsen oppstår, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>inntreffer for hver celle i den nye raden slik at du kan lagre standardverdiene i egendefinert datalageret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event, which are then displayed.
trans-unit.target: Deretter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>inntreffer for hver celle i den nye raden henter verdiene du lagret i det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>hendelse, som deretter vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer antallet kolonner som vises for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include partial columns in the displayed column count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere delvis kolonner i vises kolonneantallet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner som vises for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer antallet rader som vises for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include partial rows in the displayed row count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Inkluder deler av rader i vises radantallet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som vises for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter rektanglet som representerer visningsområdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayRectangle property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control, not including the area occupied by any scroll bars that are showing.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DisplayRectangle returnerer klienten rektanglet på skjermen for kontrollen, inkludert ikke området opptatt av side-felt som vises.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer visningsområdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og underordnet kontrollerer frigir eventuelt administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control hosted by the current cell, if a cell with an editing control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrollen vert gjeldende celle hvis en celle med et kontroll for redigering av er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis cellen er ikke i redigeringsmodus eller typen cellen ikke gi plass til en kontroll for redigering av denne egenskapen returnerer `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> hosted by the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> vert gjeldende celle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en kontroll for redigering en celle vises.

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Du kan håndtere denne hendelsen til å utføre egendefinerte initialiseringen av redigering kontrollen når en celle går inn i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse Vis egenskapene for en kontroll ved å angi egenskapene for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To perform other initialization, cast the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the specific control type and access the members directly.
trans-unit.target: Endre verdien for å utføre andre initialisering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen angitt kontrollere type, og få direkte tilgang til medlemmene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle the EditingControlShowing event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel håndtere EditingControlShowing-hendelsen for å knytte hendelsesbehandling på hendelser i kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollerer vert kontroll for redigering av én om gangen, og blir brukt redigering kontrollen når typen celle, ikke endres mellom redigeringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times.
trans-unit.target: Når du kobler hendelsen referanser til redigering kontrollen, må du derfor ta forhåndsregler for å unngå å knytte samme behandlingsprogrammet flere ganger.

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event.
trans-unit.target: For å unngå problemet, kan du fjerne behandlingsprogrammet fra hendelsen før du legger ved et behandlingsprogram hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil forhindre duplisering Hvis et behandlingsprogram er allerede knyttet til hendelsen, men har ingen virkning hvis.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the example code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se eksempelkode i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the panel that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter panelet som inneholder <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property, which is `null` when the current cell is not in edit mode, the EditingPanel property is always available.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>egenskap, som er `null` når gjeldende celle ikke er i redigeringsmodus, egenskapen EditingPanel alltid er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Panel"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Panel"> </xref> som inneholder <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how to begin editing a cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan du begynner å redigere en celle.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> values except for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> also allow a user to double-click a cell to begin editing it.
trans-unit.target: Alle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>verdier unntatt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>Tillat brukeren å Dobbeltklikk en celle for å begynne å redigere det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen vil føre til kontrollen for å angi redigeringsmodus, men initialisering av redigering celleverdien mislyktes og exe er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row and column headers use the visual styles of the user's current theme if visual styles are enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rad- og kolonneoverskrifter bruke de visuelle stilene av brukerens gjeldende tema Hvis visuelle stiler er aktivert for programmet.

trans-unit.source: You can enable visual styles for your application by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan aktivere visuelle stiler for programmet ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden før du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If EnableHeadersVisualStyles is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Hvis EnableHeadersVisualStyles er satt til `true`, alle hodet celler bortsett fra de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>er malt ved hjelp av gjeldende tema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if visual styles are enabled for the headers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis visuelle stiler er aktivert for hodene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell using the default error context.
trans-unit.target: Skriver og slutter redigeringsoperasjonen på gjeldende cellen ved å bruke standard feilkontekst.

trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan føre til et unntak hvis feil ikke behandles med de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the edit operation is committed and ended; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis redigeringsoperasjonen er utført og avsluttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke skrive celleverdien, og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Skriver og slutter redigeringsoperasjonen på gjeldende cellen ved å bruke den angitte feilen konteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first cell currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; typically, this cell is in the upper left corner.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den første cellen som vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; vanligvis denne cellen er i det øvre venstre hjørnet.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine which cell is in the first row and column currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen for å finne ut hvilken celle er i den første raden og kolonnen som vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in the upper left corner, but for right-to-left languages, it is in the upper right corner.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis dette er det øvre venstre hjørnet, men den finnes i øverst til høyre for høyre-mot-venstre språk.

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property to scroll the control to the indicated cell.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi denne egenskapen for å rulle kontrollen til den angitte cellen.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property is not in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte cellen når du angir denne egenskapen er ikke i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> property value of -1, indicating that it is a header cell or a shared cell.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte cellen når du angir denne egenskapen har en <> </> *> eller <> </> *> egenskapsverdien-1, som angir at det er en topptekstcelle eller en delt celle.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified cell when setting this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - den angitte cellen når du angir denne egenskapen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>egenskapsverdi for <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the portion of the column that is currently scrolled out of view..
trans-unit.target: Henter bredden av kolonnen som for øyeblikket er rullet utenfor visningen..

trans-unit.source: The width of the portion of the column that is scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på delen av kolonnen som er rullet utenfor visningen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the column that is the first column displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for kolonnen som er den første kolonnen vises på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that is the first column displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen som er den første kolonnen vises på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn 0 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>. -or- The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen angir en kolonne med en <> </> *> egenskapsverdi for <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>. - eller - den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen angir en kolonne med en <> </> *> egenskapsverdi for <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row that is the first row displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen som er den første raden vises på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Innstillingen for denne egenskapen opphøyer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that is the first row displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden er den første raden vises på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn 0 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a row with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>. -or- The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Frozen*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen angir en rad med en <> </> *> egenskapsverdi for <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>. - eller - den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen angir en kolonne med en <> </> *> egenskapsverdi for <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften for teksten som vises i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>egenskapen er en omkringliggende egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: En omkringliggende egenskapen er en kontrollegenskap som, hvis ikke angitt, er hentet fra den overordnede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>har samme <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>som sitt overordnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>som standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om omsluttende egenskaper i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>klassen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Drawing.Font>er uforanderlig (det vil si at du ikke kan justere egenskapene) du kan bare tilordne den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>egenskapen et nytt <xref:System.Drawing.Font>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid basere den nye skriften på eksisterende skriften.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses the value of the Font property as the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen bruker verdien for egenskapen skriften som standardverdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>objekter ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Changing the Font value automatically updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value.
trans-unit.target: Endre skrifttypen verdien automatisk oppdaterer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>Egenskaper, endre skrifttypen for en celle som arver verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells.
trans-unit.target: Hodet celler overstyre verdien som standard, og du kan overstyre verdien for bestemte rader, kolonner og celler.

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om celle stil arv [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> å bruke teksten vises av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard er verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Drawing.Font>er uforanderlig (det vil si at du ikke kan justere egenskapene) du kan bare tilordne den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>egenskapen et nytt <xref:System.Drawing.Font>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid basere den nye skriften på eksisterende skriften.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses the value of the ForeColor property as the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
