trans-unit.source: Gets the number of cells that satisfy the provided filter.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall celler som oppfyller det angitte filteret.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to determine the number of cells in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig for å finne ut hvor mange celler i en bestemt tilstand.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the number of selected cells, for example, use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: For å hente antall merkede cellene, for eksempel bruke denne metoden med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is typically more efficient than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette er vanligvis mer effektivt enn å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values specifying the cells to count.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir celler som skal telles.

trans-unit.source: The number of cells that match the includeFilter parameter.
trans-unit.target: Antall celler som samsvarer med den includeFilter parameteren.

trans-unit.source: includeFilter includes the value .
trans-unit.target: includeFilterinkluderer verdien .

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a cell.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer rektanglet som representerer visningsområdet for en celle.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the entire cell bounds or the displayed portion only.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer hele cellen grensene eller den viste delen.

trans-unit.source: To get the bounds of the cell contents only, use the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å hente grensene for cellen innholdet, bruker cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneindeks for den ønskede cellen.

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen for den ønskede cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the displayed portion of the cell only; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the entire cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Returnerer den viste delen av cellen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å returnere hele cellen grensene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display rectangle of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer visningsrektangelet cellen.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer mindre enn-1 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er mindre enn -1 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted values that represent the contents of the selected cells for copying to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter formatert verdiene som representerer innholdet i de merkede cellene for å kopiere til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden henter data som representerer området som er definert av de merkede cellene.

trans-unit.source: This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Dette området er det minste rektanglet som inneholder alle de merkede cellene.

trans-unit.source: The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for alle merkede cellene i dette området som hentes ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region.
trans-unit.target: Tom plassholder verdier som brukes for umerket celler i dette området.

trans-unit.source: This method combines these values into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> containing several formats for copying to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kombinerer disse verdiene i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>som inneholder flere formater for å kopiere til utklippstavlen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Støttede utklippstavlen formatene omfatter <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"></xref> that represents the contents of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataObject"> </xref> som representerer innholdet i de merkede cellene.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode*> is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode*>is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a column, as determined by the column index.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer rektanglet som representerer visningsområdet for en kolonne, i henhold til kolonneindeks.

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneindeks for den ønskede cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the column rectangle visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> bounds; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the entire column rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Returnerer kolonnen rektanglet vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> område; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å returnere rektangelet for hele kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display rectangle of the column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer visningsrektangelet for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall kolonner minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a row, as determined by the row index.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer rektanglet som representerer visningsområdet for en rad i henhold til radindeks.

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen for den ønskede cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the row rectangle visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> bounds; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to return the entire row rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Returnerer rad rektanglet vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> område; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å returnere rektangelet for hele raden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display rectangle of the row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer visningsrektangelet raden.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til hvor mange rader minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines separating the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på rutenettlinjene skiller cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can set the GridColor property to any color when you use a single border; with other types of borders, the colors are specified by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi GridColor-egenskapen til en farge når du bruker en enkelt kantlinje; med andre typer kantlinjer er fargene som angitt av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the GridColor property is ignored, and the current theme's colors are used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis visuelle stiler er aktivert for applikasjonen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, egenskapen GridColor ignoreres, og den gjeldende temafarger brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> or <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"> </xref> som representerer fargen på rutenettlinjene.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.KnownColor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.KnownColor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property has a <xref:System.Drawing.Color.A%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value that is less that 255.
trans-unit.target: - eller - den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen har en <xref:System.Drawing.Color.A%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapsverdien som er mindre enn 255.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns location information, such as row and column indices, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer informasjon, for eksempel rad- og indekser x - og y-koordinatene.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden for å finne ut hvilken del av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen er plassert i de angitte koordinatene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call this method—specifying the coordinates of a mouse click—to determine the row and column indexes of the clicked cell or whether a header cell or scroll bar was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel kalle denne metoden, klikker du angir koordinatene til en mus – å finne ut av rad- og indeksene klikket eller om en topptekst celle eller rullefeltet linje ble klikket.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo> that contains the location information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>som inneholder informasjon om plasseringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter det vannrette rullefeltet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> representing the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> som representerer det vannrette rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of pixels by which the control is scrolled horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall piksler som kontrollen er rullet vannrett.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels by which the control is scrolled horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Antall piksler som kontrollen er rullet vannrett.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified cell of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres den angitte cellen i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, slik at han tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig å fremtvinge en celle Oppdater i betingelser som vanligvis ikke vil forårsake en celle til tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke denne metoden med en egendefinert celletype som endrer utseende som et resultat av eksterne hendelser.

trans-unit.source: For more information about painting and invalidation, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om malingen fullføres og invalidation, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: dataGridViewCell does not belong to the .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewCelltilhører ikke den .

trans-unit.source: dataGridViewCell is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewCellis .

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the cell with the specified row and column indexes, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres cellen med de angitte rad- og indeksene, slik at han tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig å fremtvinge en celle Oppdater i betingelser som vanligvis ikke vil forårsake en celle til tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke denne metoden med en egendefinert celletype som endrer utseende som et resultat av eksterne hendelser.

trans-unit.source: For more information about painting and invalidation, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om malingen fullføres og invalidation, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneindeksen celle for å gjøre.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen for celle for å gjøre.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer mindre enn-1 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er mindre enn -1 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified column of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres den angitte kolonnen i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, slik at han tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: For more information about painting and invalidation, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om malingen fullføres og invalidation, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall kolonner minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified row of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldiggjøres den angitte raden med den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>, slik at han tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to force a row to repaint itself.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden for å fremtvinge en rad skal oppdateres seg selv.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful in owner-drawing scenarios where you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig i eieren tegning scenarioer der du håndtere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>

trans-unit.source: For more information about painting and invalidation, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om malingen fullføres og invalidation, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til hvor mange rader minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den gjeldende cellen har ulagrede endringer.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not bound to data, the cell edit is considered committed when the user moves to another cell.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er ikke bundet til data, celle Rediger anses som skrevet når brukeren flytter til en annen celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If row headers are visible, a pencil glyph is present in the header for the row that contains a cell with uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis radoverskriftene vises, finnes et liggende tegn i hodet for raden som inneholder en celle med ulagrede endringer.

trans-unit.source: If IsCurrentCellDirty is `true` and the current cell hosts an editing control, you can retrieve it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IsCurrentCellDirty `true` og gjeldende celle er vert for en kontroll for redigering, kan du hente det gjennom de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjeldende celle har ulagrede endringer. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the currently active cell is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den aktive cellen redigeres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> that has focus is always in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>som er i fokus er alltid i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: If the current cell hosts an editing control and IsCurrentCellInEditMode is `true`, you can retrieve the editing control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjeldende celle er vert for en kontroll for redigering, og IsCurrentCellInEditMode `true`, kan du hente redigering kontrollen via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is being edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjeldende celle redigeres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den gjeldende raden har ulagrede endringer.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` when the pencil glyph is displayed in the row.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer `true` når liggende tegnet vises i raden.

trans-unit.source: By default, the IsCurrentRowDirty property will always equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property, unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a data source that supports editing, or virtual mode has been implemented to use row-level commit scope.
trans-unit.target: Som standard egenskapen IsCurrentRowDirty vil alltid være lik verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>egenskapen med mindre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er bundet til en datakilde som støtter redigering virtuelle modusen eller har blitt implementert for å bruke på radnivå commit omfanget.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will evaluate this property at the row level.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>vil evaluere egenskapen på radnivå.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the user navigates away from the row, the control commits all row changes.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren navigerer bort fra raden, skriver kontrollen alle endringer i raden.

trans-unit.source: The user can also press CTRL+ENTER to commit row changes without leaving the row.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan også trykke CTRL + ENTER for å lagre endringene for rad uten å forlate raden.

trans-unit.source: To commit row changes programmatically, call the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kall til skjemaet for å lagre endringene for rad programmatisk, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your data source is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, you can also call<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden er en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>kan du kalle<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current row has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den gjeldende raden har ulagrede endringer. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et tegn er inndata tegn som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: A character is recognized as an input character depending on whether the control is in edit mode and whether the current editing control can accept the character.
trans-unit.target: Et tegn gjenkjennes som en inndata tegn avhengig av om kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, og om gjeldende redigering kontrollen godtar tegnet.

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som skal testes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is recognized as an input character; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tegnet gjenkjennes som en inndata tegn. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte nøkkelen er en vanlig inndata- eller en bestemt nøkkel som krever forhåndsbehandling.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte nøkkelen er en vanlig inndata; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the column and row with the specified indexes.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en indekserer for å hente eller angi cellen finnes i skjæringspunktet mellom kolonnen, og raden med de angitte indeksene.

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne indeksering er et alternativ til å få tilgang til cellene til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>samling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> på den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer mindre enn 0 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er mindre enn 0 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Provides an indexer to get or set the cell located at the intersection of the row with the specified index and the column with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en indekserer for å hente eller angi cellen finnes i skjæringspunktet mellom raden med den angitte indeksen, og kolonnen med det angitte navnet.

trans-unit.source: This indexer is an alternative to accessing cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne indeksering er et alternativ til å få tilgang til cellene til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>samling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kolonnen som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> på den angitte plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> at a time.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan velge mer enn én celle, rader eller kolonner i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> om gangen.

trans-unit.source: When the MultiSelect property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen MultiSelect er satt til `true`, flere elementer (celler, rader eller kolonner) kan velges i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select.
trans-unit.target: For å velge flere elementer kan brukeren holder du nede CTRL-tasten ved å klikke elementene du velger.

trans-unit.source: Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge flere elementer ved å klikke det første elementet til å velge og deretter mens du holder du nede SKIFT, klikker det siste elementet du velger.

trans-unit.source: The selection scope is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Omfanget utvalg er basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the user can select multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, kan brukeren velge flere kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the MultiSelect property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and perform an operation on all the selected elements.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen MultiSelect til at en bruker kan velge flere elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollere og utfører en operasjon på alle de valgte elementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan for eksempel velge flere celler og høyreklikker en merket celle for å vise en hurtigmeny som viser et sett med oppgaver til å utføre på de merkede cellene.

trans-unit.source: To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, you can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut hvilke celler, rader eller kolonner er valgt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll, får du tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of selected cells, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut hvor mange merkede cellene kalle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>metoden med argumentverdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> method to retrieve the number of columns.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>metode for å hente antall valgte rader og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A>metode for å hente antall kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene er mer effektiv enn tilgang til samlingene direkte når du arbeider med store mengder data.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can select more than one cell, row, or column at a time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren kan velge mer enn én celle, rader eller kolonner om gangen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen i raden for nye poster.

trans-unit.source: Unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `false`, the value of this property is equal to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>er `false`, verdien for denne egenskapen er lik antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row for new records, or -1 if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden for nye poster eller -1 Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the user navigates to the new row at the bottom of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> og brukeren navigerer til den nye raden nederst i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, this event allows a new entry to be created in the data store for the new row, and it also allows for the row to be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er i modus for virtuelle, gjør at en ny oppføring i datalageret for ny rad, og det gjør også at raden skal være fylt med standardverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that the current cell has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som gjeldende celle har ulagrede endringer.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to allow custom cell types to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> when they have uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan brukes til å tillate egendefinerte celle typer til å varsle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>når de har ulagrede endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the cell has uncommitted changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi cellen har ulagrede endringer. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne handlingen vil utføre en celleverdi eller angi redigeringsmodus, men en feil i datakilden forhindrer handlingen, og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The column changed from read-only to read/write, enabling the current cell to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen er endret fra skrivebeskyttet å lese/skrive aktivering av gjeldende celle Angi redigeringsmodus, men <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>egenskapen i den gjeldende cellen ikke angir en klasse som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og implementerer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged"></xref> event and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor*> property if the cursor was changed in user code.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged"> </xref> hendelsen og oppdateringer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor*>egenskapen Hvis markøren ble endret i brukerkode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property value depending on the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollerer endringer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>egenskapsverdien avhengig av musepekeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property stores the normal value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property and ignores the control's changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>egenskapen lagrer normal verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>egenskapen og ignorerer kontrollens endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged> event occurs, and it updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> property, if necessary, in addition to invoking any event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged>inntreffer og oppdateres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A>-egenskapen, hvis nødvendig, i tillegg til Start at hendelsesbehandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserSetCursor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged>

trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Binding operations occur when the data changes while a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is in use.
trans-unit.target: Bindingen oppstår når data endres da en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>er i bruk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will update its view and raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>inntreffer, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>oppdaterer visningen er og hever den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>-hendelse når den er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>

trans-unit.source: When entering edit mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når å angi redigeringsmodus, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>egenskapen i den gjeldende cellen ikke angir en klasse som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og implementerer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but upon entering focus, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen er konfigurert til å angi redigeringsmodus når den mottar fokus, men ved angivelse av fokus, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>egenskapen i den gjeldende cellen ikke angir en klasse som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og implementerer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen er konfigurert til å angi redigeringsmodus når den mottar fokus, men initialisering av redigering celleverdien mislyktes og exe er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This action would cause the control to enter edit mode but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne handlingen vil føre til at kontrollen for å angi redigeringsmodus, men initialisering av redigering celleverdien mislyktes og exe er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: The control is configured to enter edit mode when it receives focus, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that occur during this method are ignored unless they are one of the following: - <xref:System.NullReferenceException> - <xref href="System.StackOverflowException"></xref> - <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> - <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"></xref> - <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"></xref> - <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> - <xref href="System.AccessViolationException"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Unntak som forekommer i løpet av denne metoden ignoreres hvis de ikke er én av følgende:- <xref:System.NullReferenceException>- <xref href="System.StackOverflowException"> </xref> - <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>- <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadAbortException"> </xref> - <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"> </xref> - <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException>- <xref href="System.AccessViolationException"> </xref> </xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> </xref:System.NullReferenceException>

trans-unit.source: The control changed from read-only to read/write, enabling the current cell to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row changed from read-only to read/write, enabling the current cell to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Raden er endret fra skrivebeskyttet å lese/skrive aktivering av gjeldende celle Angi redigeringsmodus, men <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>egenskapen i den gjeldende cellen ikke angir en klasse som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og implementerer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: Validation failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Validering mislyktes og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A> property is not relevant for this control, although you can change its value and respond to such changes by handling this event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A>egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne kontrollen, selv om du kan endre verdien og svare på slike endringer ved behandling av denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Padding%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Maler bakgrunn for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Den `clipBounds` parameteren representerer området i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>som må være oppdateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en bruker dekker hele for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>med et annet vindu og finner det deretter `clipBounds` representerer hele <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en bruker dekker et lite område for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>og finner det deretter `clipBounds` representerer lite område som ble dekkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the background.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader i bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som må males.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area in which cells are drawn.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer området der tegnes celler.

trans-unit.source: Processes the A key.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses CTRL+A and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `true` når brukeren trykker CTRL + A og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, this selects all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: Som standard velger alle celler i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier som representerer nøkkelen, eller for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen ble behandlet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes keys used for navigating in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Behandler nøklene som brukes for å navigere i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A> method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller metoden nøkkel-behandling passende nøkkel trykket (for eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>metoden når F2 trykkes), og returnerer verdien som returneres av denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProcessF2Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder informasjon om nøkkelen som ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen ble behandlet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The key pressed would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen trykket vil at kontrollen ikke angi redigeringsmodus, men <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>egenskapen i den gjeldende cellen ikke angir en klasse som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og implementerer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne handlingen vil utføre en celleverdi eller angi redigeringsmodus, men en feil i datakilden forhindrer handlingen, og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - for del vil slette én eller flere rader, men en feil i datakilden forhindrer slettingen og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: Behandler del..

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` when the user presses DELETE to delete rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `true` når brukeren trykker DEL for å slette radene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The user can delete rows if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan slette rader hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to data, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the data source must also be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er bundet til data i <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for datakilden må også settes til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier som representerer nøkkelen, eller for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen ble behandlet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DELETE key would delete one or more rows, but an error in the data source prevents the deletion and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Del. vil slette én eller flere rader, men en feil i datakilden forhindrer slettingen og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes keys, such as the TAB, ESCAPE, ENTER, and ARROW keys, used to control dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: Behandler nøkler, for eksempel TAB, ESCAPE, Skriv inn- og nøkler, brukes til å kontrollere dialogbokser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called in edit mode to handle keyboard input that is not handled by the hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles i redigeringsmodus for å behandle inndata fra tastaturet som ikke behandles av den vertsbaserte redigering kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If a key press is determined to not be an input key, it will be sent to the base class for processing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en nøkkel Trykk bestemmes er ikke en inndata nøkkel, vil bli sendt til basisklasse for behandling.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key or keys to process.

trans-unit.source: The key pressed would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen trykket vil at kontrollen ikke angi redigeringsmodus, men <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>egenskapen i den gjeldende cellen ikke angir en klasse som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og implementerer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne handlingen vil utføre en celleverdi eller angi redigeringsmodus, men en feil i datakilden forhindrer handlingen, og det er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
