trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan redigere cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A cell is read-only if the value of the ReadOnly property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: En celle er skrivebeskyttet hvis verdien for egenskapen ReadOnly `true` til cellen, den cellen rad, den cellen kolonnen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user cannot edit the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren ikke kan redigere cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>gjeldende celle er i redigeringsmodus, og den gjeldende cellen inneholder endringer som kan ikke utføres.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event or the handler has set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen vil føre til kontrollen for å angi redigeringsmodus, men initialisering av redigering celleverdien mislyktes og exe er noe behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> hendelse eller et behandlingsprogram er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak objektet kan vanligvis endres til typen <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer verdien i den gjeldende cellen med den underliggende celleverdien Hvis cellen i redigeringsmodus, forkaster alle tidligere verdier.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden hvis du vil tvinge en celle for å oppdatere visningsverdien i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når en ekstern prosess endrer celleverdien, og du vil varsle bruker for endringen, selv om en brukerdefinert endring mistes resultatet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det er fullført. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event occurred.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>egenskapen til standardverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Although this method behaves as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne metoden fungerer som beskrevet, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>egenskapen gjelder ikke for denne kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad hurtigmenyen kreves.

trans-unit.source: The RowContextMenuStripNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen RowContextMenuStripNeeded inntreffer bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>-egenskap er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Handling the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av hendelsen RowContextMenuStripNeeded er nyttig når du vil vise en hurtigmeny som fastsettes i en rad gjeldende tilstand, eller verdiene i den.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Når du håndtere hendelsen RowContextMenuStripNeeded, hurtigmenyen som du angir i behandlingsprogrammet vises når brukeren høyreklikker en rad med mindre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>overstyrer hurtigmenyen for denne cellen som ble klikket.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The RowContextMenuStripNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen RowContextMenuStripNeeded oppstår også når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen hentes, enten programmatisk eller når brukeren høyreklikker en rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å avgjøre statusen til en rad eller verdiene i den, og bruke denne informasjonen til å endre eller endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er initialisert med verdien for raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskapen hendelsen overstyre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the RowContextMenuStripNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Behandle RowContextMenuStripNeeded hendelsen når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser stille raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>verdien for flere rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall rader som vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If RowCount is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis RowCount er satt til en verdi mindre enn den gjeldende verdien, rader vil bli fjernet fra slutten av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If RowCount is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis RowCount er satt til en verdi større enn den gjeldende verdien, rader legges til slutten av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The additional rows are based on the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Flere rader som er basert på rad som er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RowCount property to 0, all rows will be removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis RowCount-egenskapen settes til 0, fjernes alle rader fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette er det samme kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`, you cannot set RowCount to 0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>er `true`, du kan ikke angi RowCount til 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to remove all rows except the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å fjerne alle radene unntatt rader for nye poster.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A> has the same result as setting RowCount to 1 in this case, but is much faster.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>har du samme resultat som hvis RowCount til 1 i dette tilfellet, men er mye raskere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RowCount property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RowCount kan bare brukes med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>til å opprette en enkel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>for visning og redigering av tekst.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the RowCount property to a value greater than 0 for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control without columns, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is added automatically.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir RowCount-egenskapen til en verdi større enn 0 for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen uten kolonner, en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>er lagt til automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to display in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som skal vises i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value is less than 1 and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - den angitte verdien er mindre enn 1 og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>egenskapen for en rad endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen for en rad er satt til en ny verdi, eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>for en rad er satt til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med minst én egenskapsverdi forskjellig fra tidligere celle stil objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> trenger for å bestemme om den gjeldende raden har ulagrede endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: By default, this event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen settes som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true` Hvis celler i den gjeldende raden er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row.
trans-unit.target: Dette fører til at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>hendelsen oppstår når brukeren gjenoppretter endringer i en rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>

trans-unit.source: Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Brukere kan gå tilbake endringer i en rad ved å trykke ESC to ganger når en celle i redigeringsmodus eller én gang utenfor redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan brukes til å tilpasse commit område i virtuelle modus ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til riktig verdi avhengig av det valgte commit-området.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren dobbeltklikker skillelinjen mellom to rader.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å tilpasse størrelse automatisk problemet som oppstår når en bruker dobbeltklikker skillelinjen en rad.

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: Raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>egenskapen utvider ikke området som en bruker kan dobbeltklikke.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har økt høyden på en skillelinjen ved å bruke denne egenskapen, vil denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren dobbeltklikker grense mellom skillelinjen og den tilstøtende kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight*>

trans-unit.source: The divider height is modified by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på skillelinjen endres ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row receives input focus but before it becomes the current row.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad mottar inndata fokus, men før det blir den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>opprinnelig lastes, og når brukeren velger en rad enn den gjeldende raden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>egenskapen er oppdatert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property within the event handler.
trans-unit.target: For å hente indeksen i raden nylig angitt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen i hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*> property of a row changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*>for en rad endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad feilteksten er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: The RowErrorTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen RowErrorTextNeeded inntreffer bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen er satt eller tilhørende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling the RowErrorTextNeeded event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: Behandling av hendelsen RowErrorTextNeeded er nyttig når du vil finne feil for en rad avhengig av tilstanden og verdiene i den.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the RowErrorTextNeeded event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Når du behandle RowErrorTextNeeded-hendelsen og angi feilteksten i behandlingsprogrammet, symbol en feil vises i rad-overskrift med mindre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren flytter pekeren over tegnet feil, vises feilteksten i et verktøytips.

trans-unit.source: The RowErrorTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen RowErrorTextNeeded oppstår også når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen hentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å avgjøre statusen til en rad eller verdiene i den, og bruke denne informasjonen til å endre eller endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er initialisert med verdien for raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>egenskapen hendelsen overstyre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the RowErrorTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Behandle RowErrorTextNeeded hendelsen når du arbeider med store mengder data å unngå ytelse bestemmelser stille raden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>verdien for flere rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen på rad overskriftsceller.

trans-unit.source: If the RowHeadersBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen RowHeadersBorderStyle settes til noe annet enn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>egenskapen må være en systemfarge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi denne egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>verdi som er en skrivebeskyttet verdi som indikerer at kantlinjestilen er tilpasset ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the row headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis visuelle stiler er aktivert for applikasjonen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>egenskapen `true`, radoverskriftene er malt ved hjelp av gjeldende tema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the RowHeadersBorderStyle property is ignored for all row headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet for RowHeadersBorderStyle-egenskapen ignoreres verdien for alle rad overskrifter bortsett fra de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, som oppsettet ikke er brukt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardstilen som brukes til rad-overskriftsceller.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returneres av denne egenskapen har følgende første egenskapsverdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: To force row headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: Tvinge radoverskriftene skal arve <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>verdier, må du angi verdiene i RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle-objektet til standardverdiene som er angitt for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om celle stil arv [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the default style applied to the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer standardstilen som brukes til rad-overskriftsceller.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en egenskap for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen er satt til en ny verdi eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>er satt til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med minst én egenskapsverdi forskjellig fra tidligere celle stil objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column that contains row headers is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kolonnen som inneholder radoverskriftene skal vises.

trans-unit.source: If the RowHeadersVisible property is `false`, a row whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true`can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking the mouse cursor anywhere along the bottom border of the row to be resized.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen RowHeadersVisible `false`, en rad der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A>er satt til `true`kan fremdeles endres i brukergrensesnittet (UI) ved å klikke pekeren hvor som helst langs nederste kant av raden som skal endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column that contains row headers is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kolonnen som inneholder radoverskriftene vises. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode*>er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column that contains the row headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på kolonnen som inneholder radoverskriftene i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The RowHeadersWidth property can be used to resize the row header column to a specified width.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RowHeadersWidth kan brukes til å endre størrelse på rad overskrift kolonne til en angitt bredde.

trans-unit.source: To adjust the width of this column to fit the contents of the row header cells, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Juster bredden på denne kolonnen til å tilpasse innholdet i rad overskriftcellene ved bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the column that contains row headers.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på kolonnen som inneholder radoverskriftene i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The default is 43.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 43.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum width of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum width of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn minimumsbredden for 4 piksler eller er større enn den maksimale bredden på 32768 piksler.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bredden på radoverskriftene justeres og det kan justeres av brukeren eller justeres automatisk for å tilpasse innholdet i hodene.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til en størrelse automatisk-modus, kan ikke justeres bredden på radoverskriftene av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil justere høyden for radoverskriftene programmatisk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>metoden eller sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi skalering-modus for kolonneoverskriftene ved bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hodet skalering [alternative størrelser i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen støtter ikke doble bufring.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>er satt til `true` i en avledet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll brukere får ikke visuelle tilbakemeldinger når endring rader, kolonner eller hode, eller når omorganisering av kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> verdi som angir bredden på radoverskriftene kan justeres modus.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height*>egenskapen for en rad endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when information about row height is requested.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når informasjonen om radhøyden kreves.

trans-unit.source: This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er nyttig for å beholde egendefinerte rad etter en operasjon for sortering.

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nødvendig fordi sortering operasjoner håndteres vanligvis av datakilde, som ikke holde oversikt over samsvar mellom rader med data og rader i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>egenskapen er angitt eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations.
trans-unit.target: I det siste tilfellet, kan du angi din egen datalageret og sortering operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height.
trans-unit.target: Behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>-hendelsen for å lagre oppdaterte høyde informasjon når brukeren endrer radhøyden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>

trans-unit.source: Use RowHeightInfoNeeded to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowHeightInfoNeeded til å hente informasjon om lagrede høyde når kontrollen må den.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren endrer høyden på en rad.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>er satt til `true` eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>settes til en annen verdi enn `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen til å spore og lagre rad høyde informasjon slik at den kan gjenopprettes etter en operasjon for sortering.

trans-unit.source: To restore height information, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjenopprette høyde informasjon, kan du behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren endrer bare høyden på en rad.

trans-unit.source: If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer høyden på en rad programmatisk, må du lagre den nye høyde informasjonen om gangen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row loses input focus and is no longer the current row.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad mister inndata fokus og er ikke lenger den gjeldende raden.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*>egenskapen for en rad endres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight*>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> is painted.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> males.

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan håndtere denne hendelsen alene eller sammen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>-hendelsen for å tilpasse utseendet til rader i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fargemerknader hele rader selv eller paint bestemte deler av rader og bruke følgende metoder for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>klassen for å fargemerknader i andre deler:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A>du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>klassen for å fargemerknader standard kontroller ved hjelp av gjeldende tema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [gjengivelse kontroller med visuelle stiler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], du har også tilgang til et stort bibliotek for standard bilder som du kan bruke med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> is painted
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> males

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan håndtere denne hendelsen alene eller sammen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>-hendelsen for å tilpasse utseendet til rader i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fargemerknader hele rader selv eller paint bestemte deler av rader og bruke følgende metoder for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>klassen for å fargemerknader i andre deler:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A>du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>klassen for å fargemerknader standard kontroller ved hjelp av gjeldende tema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [gjengivelse kontroller med visuelle stiler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], du har også tilgang til et stort bibliotek for standard bilder som du kan bruke med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder alle radene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Rows collection to manually populate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control instead of binding it to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke samlingen rader manuelt for å fylle ut et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen i stedet for bindingen til en datakilde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplet nedenfor viser manuelt legge til og sette inn rader.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have added four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> instances to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Dette eksemplet antar at du har lagt til fire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>forekomster til kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` [C#] ``` this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` [C#] ``` this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` mer informasjon som programmatisk fyller ut en ubundet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>styre, kan du se delen eksempel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows include style information in addition to cell values.
trans-unit.target: Rader inkluderer stilinformasjon i tillegg til celleverdiene.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled.
trans-unit.target: Derfor bør du legge til eller sette inn rader som er basert på eksisterende rader som du allerede har stilen.

trans-unit.source: You can do this using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Rows collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke samlingen rader å endre verdiene i kontrollen eller fjerne rader.

trans-unit.source: You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre verdier eller fjerne rader uansett om kontrollen er bundet til en ekstern datakilde.

trans-unit.source: If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en datakilde, er endringene direkte til datakilden.

trans-unit.source: You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however.
trans-unit.target: Du må kanskje fortsatt push kilde dataoppdateringer imidlertid til en ekstern database.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: binde Data i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplet nedenfor viser hvordan du endrer celleverdiene programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` [C#] ``` // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the Rows collection to retrieve information about rows.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` [C#] ``` // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` du kan bruke rader-samlingen i tillegg til standard samlingen funksjoner til å hente informasjon om rader.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A> method to determine the state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>metode for å fastsette tilstanden for en bestemt rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A>metoder for å bestemme antall rader eller kombinert høyden på radene i en bestemt tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: For å hente indeksen for en rad med en bestemt tilstand, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplet nedenfor viser hvordan du hente indeksen for den første merkede raden, og deretter bruke den for å programmatisk slette raden.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` [C#] ``` Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> returned by the Rows property can include shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` [C#] ``` Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` å forbedre ytelsen, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>returnert av radene kan egenskapen inneholde delte og delt rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: Delt rader dele minne til å redusere av et stort registrere sett.

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the Rows property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis settet med registrere er svært, må du passe Behold rader som er delt som mulig under tilgang til egenskapen rader.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref> that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle radene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a new row is added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en ny rad er lagt til i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Rader i kontrollen sorteres ikke automatisk når nye rader er lagt til.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a RowsAdded event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sortere nye rader i den riktige plasseringen, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>metoden i en RowsAdded hendelsesbehandling.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren legger til en ny rad ved hjelp av raden for nye poster i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdi i et behandlingsprogram for denne hendelsen er lik plasseringen for nye radverdiene for nye poster som er større enn raden nettopp la til indeksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you add rows programmatically, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> value is the index of the first row added.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til rader programmatisk, men den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>verdien er indeksen i den første raden legges til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, this event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår i virtuelle modus før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>hendelse og kan brukes til å opprette nye oppføringer i datalageret som du kan deretter fylle ut i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standardstilen som brukes til rad-cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Viser cellene ved hjelp av stiler som er angitt av cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>egenskapen som arver stiler fra andre egenskaper av typen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> for kontrollen</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the RowsDefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: For cellene i alle radene unntatt hodet celler overstyre stiler som er angitt i egenskapen RowsDefaultCellStyle stiler angitt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper og av stiler angitt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Under henting av denne egenskapen en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med standard verdier opprettes hvis egenskapen ikke har allerede blitt åpnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til en innvirkning på ytelsen ved henting av denne egenskapen for mange rader.

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
