trans-unit.target: Når det er mulig å bruke én <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>å angi denne egenskapen for flere rader.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the row cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> skal brukes på rad cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en egenskap for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>egenskapen er satt til en ny verdi eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>er satt til en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>med minst én egenskapsverdi forskjellig fra tidligere celle stil objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row or rows are deleted from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en eller flere rader slettes fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When rows are deleted from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, the index numbers of subsequent rows are lowered to compensate.
trans-unit.target: Når radene er slettet fra en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll, indeksen antall etterfølgende radene er senket til kompensere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row changes state, such as losing or gaining input focus.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad endres tilstand, for eksempel går tapt eller har inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir raden som representerer malen for alle radene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> rows than what is provided by the various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger du ønsker større kontroll over utseendet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>rader enn den som er angitt av de ulike <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>celle stilegenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The RowTemplate property lets you create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RowTemplate kan du opprette og starte en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>for bruk som en mal ved alle rader, inkludert raden for nye poster hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du setter standardverdier for egenskaper som radhøyden.

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel øk radhøyden standard for å kunne tilby ekstra plass under vanlig celleinnholdet for å vise innhold som går over flere kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Angi malen rad er nødvendig når eksterne data vises ved hjelp av egendefinerte typer som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: With unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls, you can programmatically populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection with instances of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: Med ubundet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroller, du kan programmatisk fylle ut den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>samling med forekomster av den egendefinerte radtypen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: Når du viser eksterne data, men radene genereres automatisk, men de er basert på rad-malen som du kan angi til en forekomst av den egendefinerte radtypen.

trans-unit.source: If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt første gang du hente verdien, en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>opprettes og returnerte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> representing the row template.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> som representerer malen rad.

trans-unit.source: The specified row when setting this property has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*> property set.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte raden når du angir denne egenskapen har den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*>egenskapen angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's state changes from shared to unshared.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad tilstand endres fra delt med delt.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event during development and testing to help identify code that causes rows to change from a shared to an unshared state.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen under utvikling og testing til å identifisere kode som fører til at rader som skal endres fra en delt til en delt tilstand.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when scaling the control to display large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når skalering kontroll for å vise store mengder data.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a row has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad er ferdig med å validere.

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er det samme som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform post-processing on a row of values.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne hendelsen til å utføre etterbehandling i raden med verdier.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row is validating.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rad valideres.

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er det samme som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne hendelsen til å utføre validering på alle verdier i en rad.

trans-unit.source: If the row does not pass validation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis raden ikke bestod valideringen, angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event prevents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName> events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du avbryter denne hendelsen hindrer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName>hendelser gjentar seg også hindrer at brukeren lar ugyldig raden og hindrer at raden oppdateringsendringer lagres i en ekstern datakilde i data bundne modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user scrolls through the control contents.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren ruller gjennom innholdet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of scroll bars to display for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvilken type side-felt som skal vises for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of this property, scroll bars are shown only when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: Uavhengig av verdien for denne egenskapen vises side-felt bare når det er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent scroll bars from appearing.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hindre at side-felt som vises.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to provide an alternative user interface (UI) for scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig, for eksempel når du vil angi en alternativ brukergrensesnittet (UI) for rulling.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is unable to scroll due to a cell change that cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen kan ikke angis fordi den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kan ikke rulle på grunn av en Celleendring som ikke kan iverksatt eller avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Velger alle cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er i modus for kolonne-merking og denne metoden kalles, hver kolonne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>er satt til `true`, og hver rad <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Conversely, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Omvendt, når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>er i modus for rad-merking og denne metoden kalles, hver rad <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>er satt til `true`, og hver kolonne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter samling av celler som er valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedCells property is always populated regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedCells fylles alltid uavhengig av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen inneholder en skrivebeskyttet statisk utvalg for det merkede området da det refereres til.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du holder på en kopi av denne samlingen, den kan være forskjellig fra den faktiske etterfølgende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>tilstand som brukeren kan ha blitt endret utvalget.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du bør derfor ikke fungere på en kopi av samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"></xref> that represents the cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"> </xref> som representerer cellene valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av kolonner som er valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> for the SelectedColumns property to be populated with selected columns.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>for egenskapen SelectedColumns brukes med valgte kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen inneholder en skrivebeskyttet statisk utvalg for det merkede området da det refereres til.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du holder på en kopi av denne samlingen, den kan være forskjellig fra den faktiske etterfølgende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>tilstand som brukeren kan ha blitt endret utvalget.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du bør derfor ikke fungere på en kopi av samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"></xref> that represents the columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"> </xref> som representerer kolonnene som er merket av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av rader som er valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> for the SelectedRows property to be populated with selected rows.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>for egenskapen SelectedRows brukes med merkede radene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen inneholder en skrivebeskyttet statisk utvalg for det merkede området da det refereres til.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du holder på en kopi av denne samlingen, den kan være forskjellig fra den faktiske etterfølgende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>tilstand som brukeren kan ha blitt endret utvalget.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du bør derfor ikke bruker en kopi av samlingen.

trans-unit.source: To programmatically select a row, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å programmatisk velge en rad, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"></xref> that contains the rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"> </xref> som inneholder radene som er valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjeldende valg endres.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når celler er merket eller utvalget er avbrutt om programmatisk eller brukerhandling.

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er for eksempel nyttig når du vil vise summen av de merkede cellene.

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property, the SelectionChanged event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Når du endrer verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapen hendelsen SelectionChanged forekommer før de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any SelectionChanged event handler accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: SelectionChanged hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapen nå får den forrige verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan cellene i de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kan velges.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the SelectionMode property clears the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Endre verdien for egenskapen SelectionMode fjerner gjeldende utvalg.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*> property of one or more columns is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>for én eller flere kolonner er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet overstyrer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the width or height values exceeds the maximum value of 8,388,607.
trans-unit.target: En eller begge overskrider maksimumsverdien 8,388,607 verdiområde bredde og høyde.

trans-unit.source: Sets the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir den aktive cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen bruker denne metoden når gjeldende celle forvandles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the current cell without changing the selection and optionally without validating the previous cell or changing the selection anchor cell.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden endrer gjeldende celle uten å endre utvalget og eventuelt uten å validere den forrige cellen eller endre utvalget ankeret cellen.

trans-unit.source: The anchor cell is the first cell of a block of multiple cells that the user can select by holding down the SHIFT key and clicking the last cell of the block.
trans-unit.target: Ankeret cellen er den første cellen i en blokk med flere celler som brukeren kan velge ved å holde nede SKIFT og klikke den siste cellen i blokken.

trans-unit.source: If `rowIndex` and `columnIndex` are both -1, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `rowIndex` og `columnIndex` er begge -1, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the new current cell the anchor cell for a subsequent multicell selection using the SHIFT key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>gjør den nye gjeldende cellen Ankercelle for et etterfølgende multicell utvalg med SKIFT; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the value in the old current cell and cancel the change if validation fails; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>validere verdien i den gamle gjeldende cellen og avbryte endringen Hvis valideringen mislykkes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is being set as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjeldende celle angis som et resultat av et museklikk; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell was successfully set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjeldende celle er angitt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1, and rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer mindre enn 0 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1, og rowIndex enn -1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1, and columnIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er mindre enn 0 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1, og columnIndex enn -1.

trans-unit.source: The specified cell has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte cellen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>egenskapsverdi for <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: -or- This method was called for a reason other than the underlying data source being reset, and another thread is currently executing this method.
trans-unit.target: - eller - denne metoden ble kalt for en årsak enn den underliggende datakilden blir tilbakestilt, og en annen tråd kjører for øyeblikket denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The new current cell tried to enter edit mode, but its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den nye gjeldende cellen prøvde å angi redigeringsmodus, men den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>egenskapen ikke angir en klasse som er avledet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> og implementerer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the cell with the specified row and column indexes.
trans-unit.target: Endrer utvalgstilstanden til cellen med de angitte rad- og -indeksene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen bruker denne metoden når den endres utvalgstilstanden celleegenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: State-merking uten hensyn til gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapsverdien, og uten å endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du vil implementere din egen utvalget-modus.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the cell; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to cancel the selection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge cellen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å avbryte utvalget av cellen.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer mindre enn 0 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er mindre enn 0 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the column with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Endrer valgtilstanden i kolonnen med den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen bruker denne metoden når den endres utvalgstilstanden til en kolonne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: State-merking uten hensyn til gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapsverdien, og uten å endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du vil implementere din egen utvalget-modus.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to cancel the selection of the column.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge kolonnen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å avbryte utvalget av kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer mindre enn 0 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the row with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Endrer valgtilstanden av raden med den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen bruker denne metoden når den endres valgtilstanden av en rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: State-merking uten hensyn til gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapsverdien, og uten å endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du vil implementere din egen utvalget-modus.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the row; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to cancel the selection of the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge raden; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å avbryte utvalget av raden.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer mindre enn 0 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show cell errors.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil vise cellefeil.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a red glyph will appear in a cell that fails validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et røde tegn som skal vises i en celle som mislykkes validering; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not ToolTips will show when the mouse pointer pauses on a cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verktøytips vises når pekeren ligger på en celle.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not `null` or the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, and a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien for denne egenskapen er `true` og musepekeren holdes over en celle, viser cellen et verktøytips når en av følgende betingelser er oppfylt:-verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>egenskapen er ikke `null` eller verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true`, og et behandlingsprogram for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>hendelsen, settes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property of the cell has a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>Egenskapen i cellen har en annen verdi enn <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect when there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen har ingen virkning hvis det er en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>hendelsesbehandlingen fordi henting av verdien for egenskapen automatisk opphøyer hendelsen, og returnerer teksten for verktøytipset angitt i behandlingsprogrammet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: - The cell value is truncated in the cell display.
trans-unit.target: -Verdien er avkortet i cellen visningen.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien i cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>egenskapsverdi <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, hele verdien i den avkortede celleverdien vises i verktøytipset.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cell ToolTips are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen verktøytips er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the editing glyph is visible in the row header of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvorvidt redigering symbol er synlig i radoverskrift i cellen som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Radoverskriften vises en redigering tegn som ser ut som en liggende når gjeldende celle er i redigeringsmodus, og brukeren har gjort endringer i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph is colored by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: Redigering tegnet består ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>for rad overskriftscellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet gjengis ikke hvis det ikke er nok plass til å vise den fullstendig.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row header cell has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis rad overskriftscelle inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>egenskapen angitt tegnet fjernes hvis det ikke er nok plass til tekst og symbol.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A> property in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Visning av redigering tegnet styres av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>egenskap i virtuelle modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den styres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: The standard glyph is not publicly exposed.
trans-unit.target: Standard tegn er ikke eksponert offentlig.

trans-unit.source: To customize the glyph, you can create a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse tegnet, kan du opprette en egendefinert <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing glyph is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis redigering symbol er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers will display error glyphs for each row that contains a data entry error.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om radoverskriftene viser feil symboler for hver rad inneholder en oppføring datafeil.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>egenskapen angir om det er en feil i én av cellene i en rad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty>, then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>er satt til en annen verdi enn <xref:System.String.Empty>, deretter symbol en feil (![ErrorProvider ikonet](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider ikonet")) vises i rad-overskrift.</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Standardbredden på rad-hodet inneholder nok plass til å vise feil-tegnet om tegnet vises eller ikke.

trans-unit.source: If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hodet radstørrelsen er justert slik at det ikke er nok plass til å vise tegnet fullstendig, gjengis ikke tegnet.

trans-unit.source: Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Fordi radoverskriftene kan vise både tekst og symboler, innhold vises etter prioritet, som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: Text displayed in the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises i rad overskriftscellen.

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph.
trans-unit.target: Redigering tegnet.

trans-unit.source: The error glyph.
trans-unit.target: Feil-tegn.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis rad bredden reduseres, forsvinner feil tegnet først deretter standard tegnet, og deretter tekst.

trans-unit.source: Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class.
trans-unit.target: Advanced-brukere kan tilpasse tegnet feil ved å utvikle tilpassede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> indicates there is an error; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> angir feil; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control using an implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Sorterer innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollere ved hjelp av en implementering av den <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan Avansert tilpassing av funksjonen sortering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName> interface as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: For å implementere en svært tilpassede sorterings-operasjon, kan du skrive en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>hendelsen og kalle denne metoden med en forekomst av en klasse som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnitt som en parameter.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet du vanligvis angis av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>å deaktivere automatisk sortering og ha plass til et sortering tegn.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du sorterer etter kolonner som er satt til programmatisk Sorteringsmodus, må du vise sortering tegnet selv ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fungerer bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source.
trans-unit.target: Når du binder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen til en ekstern datakilde, må du bruke sortering operasjonene fra datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppgir en datakilde ved å implementere virtuelle modus, må du også håndtere sortering operasjonene selv.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden automatisk angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>egenskapen `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> that performs the custom sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Implementering av <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>som utfører egendefinerte sorteringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: comparer is .
trans-unit.target: compareris .

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>. -or- <>*> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Sorterer innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge basert på innholdet i den angitte kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: This method sorts the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> by comparing values in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden sorterer innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>ved å sammenligne verdier i den angitte kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the sort operation will use the <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A> method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Som standard bruker sorteringen av <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>metode til å sammenligne par med cellene i kolonnen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: For kolonner med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>egenskapene er angitt automatisk og vises riktig sortering tegnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For kolonner med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>-egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, må du vise sortering tegnet selv via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse sorteringsoperasjonen brukes av denne metoden ved behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>egenskapen er angitt, denne metoden fungerer for bare kolonner som er bundet til data.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound columns have had their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set.
trans-unit.target: Databundet kolonner har hatt deres <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Dette fører til at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å returnere `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen inneholder både bundet og ubundet kolonner, må du implementere virtuelle modus for å beholde verdiene i kolonnene ubundet når kontrollen er sortert etter en bundet kolonne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property to `true` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapen `true` og behandler de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the column is editable, you should also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kolonnen redigerbare, må du også håndtere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om virtuelle modus [slik: Implementer virtuelle modus i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Sortering av ubundet kolonner når kontrollen er bundet til data støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: The column by which to sort the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen som skal sorteres innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The specified column is not part of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte kolonnen er ikke en del av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property has been set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound*> property of the specified column returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <> </> *> egenskapen er angitt og <> </> *>-egenskapen for den angitte kolonnen returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: dataGridViewColumn is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewColumnis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound*> property of the specified column returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> og <> </> *>-egenskapen for den angitte kolonnen returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property does not implement the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> interface. -or- The object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - objektet som er angitt av den <> </> *> egenskapen implementerer ikke den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref> grensesnitt. - eller - objektet som er angitt av den <> </> *> egenskapen har en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapsverdi for <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> sammenligner to celleverdiene for å utføre sortering.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>egenskapsverdi `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen sammenligner par med cellene i kolonnen som sorteres etter.

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer bare når brukeren klikker hodet i en kolonne med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, eller når du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29>overbelaste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når for en kolonne med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, må du vise sortering tegnet selv via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å sortere rader med celleverdiene i én kolonne eller flere kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>Egenskaper for å sammenligne celleverdier i kolonnen som er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>Egenskaper for å få tilgang til verdier i andre kolonner i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control completes a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen er en operasjon for sortering.

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>er satt til `true` og kontrollen er sortert etter en ubundet kolonne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column by which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter kolonnen som de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> innholdet sorteres for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not sorted, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>ikke er sortert, denne egenskapen skal returnere `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the column indicated by this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når kolonnen som er angitt av denne egenskapen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, vises det et sortering tegn som er basert på verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Når kolonnen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, må du vise sortering tegnet selv via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Verdien for denne egenskapen er ikke betydning når du sorterer kontrollen ved hjelp av egendefinert sortering.

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egendefinerte sortering, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29>metoden og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> by which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> innholdet sorteres for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control are sorted in ascending or descending order, or are not sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontroll er sortert i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge eller ikke er sortert.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å avgjøre hvilke sortering symbol vises når kolonnen som er angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>egenskapen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når kolonnen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, må du vise og skjule sortering tegnet selv via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>
