trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Når kolonnen har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, kan du vise sortering tegnet, men området, er ikke reservert for Hvis kolonnen endrer størrelse automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Verdien for denne egenskapen er ikke betydning når du sorterer kontrollen ved hjelp av egendefinert sortering.

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egendefinerte sortering, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>metoden og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du TAB flyttes fokus til den neste kontrollen i kategorien rekkefølge i stedet for glidende fokus til den neste cellen i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes `false` tillater TAB for å flytte fokus i rutenettet celler.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver hvordan celle fokus endres når de angitte kategorien key kombinasjonene trykkes.

trans-unit.source: |Key combination|Result| |---------------------|------------| |TAB|If the StandardTab property is `false`, the focus moves to the next cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: | Samtidig | Resultatet | |---------------------|------------| | KATEGORIEN | Hvis egenskapen StandardTab er `false`, flyttes fokus til den neste cellen i raden.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the last cell in the row, the focus moves to the first cell in the next row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis fokus er i den siste cellen i raden fokus flyttes til den første cellen i neste rad.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the last cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the focus moves to the next control in the tab order.| |SHIFT+TAB|If StandardTab is `false`, the focus moves to the previous cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis fokus er i den siste cellen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, fokus flyttes til den neste kontrollen i kategorien rekkefølge. | | SKIFT + TAB | Hvis StandardTab `false`, flyttes fokus til forrige celle i raden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the first cell in the row, the focus moves to the last cell in the previous row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis fokus er i den første cellen i raden, flyttes til den siste fokus celle i forrige rad.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the first cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the focus moves to the previous control in the tab order.| |CTRL+TAB|The focus moves to the next control in the tab order.|
trans-unit.target: Hvis fokus er i den første cellen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, flyttes fokus til forrige kontroll i kategorien rekkefølge. | | CTRL + TAB | Fokuset flyttes til den neste kontrollen i kategorien rekkefølge. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du TAB flytter fokus til den neste kontrollen i kategorien rekkefølge. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control style changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen stilen endres.

trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er relevante for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som er knyttet til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er meningsløst for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er knyttet til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, its value can be changed, thereby causing this event to occur.
trans-unit.target: Selv om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>er ikke betydning for denne kontrollen, verdien kan endres, og dermed fører til at denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header cell located in the upper left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir overskrift-celle, finnes ikke i det øvre venstre hjørnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows you to set a value for the cell, associate a shortcut menu with it, or perform any other operations you can perform on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen kan du angi en verdi for cellen, tilknytte en hurtigmeny til den, eller du kan utføre andre oppgaver du kan utføre på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: In applications designed for use with right-to-left languages, the cell represented by this property is typically in the upper-right corner.
trans-unit.target: Cellen representert av denne egenskapen er vanligvis i øverst til høyre i programmer som er utviklet for bruk med språk høyre til venstre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> located at the upper left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> på øverste venstre hjørne av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the cell at the specified location to update its error text.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger cellen i den angitte plasseringen til å oppdatere feilteksten.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you maintain cell error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du opprettholde celle feilteksten selv ved behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden når du endrer lagrede feilteksten for den angitte cellen.

trans-unit.source: This will invalidate the cell, forcing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated error text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Cellen, blir fremtvinging av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen for å hente oppdaterte feilteksten via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Although you can use this method to update errors for header cells, column header cells do not display error glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Men du kan bruke denne metoden til å oppdatere feil for overskriftsceller, vises ikke kolonner hodet celler feil symboler.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell to update, or -1 to indicate a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneindeks i cellen til oppdateringen eller&1; for å angi en rad overskriftscelle.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell to update, or -1 to indicate a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen i cellen til oppdateringen eller&1; for å angi en kolonner hodet celle.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer mindre enn-1 eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er mindre enn -1 eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to update its display of the cell at the specified location based on its new value, applying any automatic sizing modes currently in effect.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger kontrollen for å oppdatere visningen for celle i den angitte plasseringen basert på den nye verdien, bruker en størrelse automatisk modi som er i kraft.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you maintain cell values in virtual mode and you update a value in your custom data cache outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden hvis du opprettholder celleverdiene i virtuelle modus, og du oppdaterer en verdi i den egendefinerte hurtigbufferen utenfor en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: This method invalidates the cell, forcing the control to retrieve the new value through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event handler and apply any automatic sizing modes that are in effect.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden ugyldiggjøres cellen, fremtvinger kontrollen for å hente den nye verdien i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>hendelsesbehandlingen og bruke en hvilken som helst størrelse automatisk modi som er aktivert.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column index of the cell with the new value.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte kolonneindeksen i cellen med den nye verdien.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell with the new value.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte radindeksen i cellen med den nye verdien.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than zero or greater than the number of columns in the control minus one.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexer mindre enn null eller større enn antallet kolonner i kontrollen minus&1;.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the control minus one.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er mindre enn null eller større enn antall rader i kontrollen minus&1;.

trans-unit.source: Forces the row at the given row index to update its error text.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger raden i den angitte radindeksen å oppdatere feilteksten.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig når du opprettholde rad feilteksten selv ved behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden når du endrer lagrede feilteksten for den angitte raden.

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil tvinge den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen for å hente oppdaterte teksten via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden som skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: Forces the rows in the given range to update their error text.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger rader i det angitte området til å oppdatere sine feilteksten.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig når du opprettholde rad feilteksten selv ved behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified rows.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden når du endrer lagrede feilteksten for de angitte radene.

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil tvinge den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen for å hente oppdaterte teksten via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first row in the set of rows to update.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den første raden i settet med rader du vil oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last row in the set of rows to update.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den siste raden i settet med rader du vil oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: rowIndexStart is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexStarter ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexEnd is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndexEnd er ikke i det gyldige området fra 0 til antall rader i kontrollen minus 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexEnd is less than rowIndexStart.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndexEnd er mindre enn rowIndexStart.

trans-unit.source: Forces the specified row or rows to update their height information.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger angitte raden eller radene du vil oppdatere informasjonen om høyde.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row heights yourself using handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> events.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig når du opprettholder rad selv med behandlingsprogrammer for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method whenever you change the stored row heights outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden når du endrer de lagrede partall utenfor en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated height information through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil tvinge den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen for å hente oppdaterte høyde informasjon gjennom den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first row to update.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den første raden å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to update the specified row and all subsequent rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å oppdatere den angitte rad- og alle etterfølgende radene.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than 0 and updateToEnd is .
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer mindre enn 0 og updateToEnd er .

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 and updateToEnd is .
trans-unit.target: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 and updateToEnd is .

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is greater than the highest row index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: - eller - rowIndex er større enn den høyeste radindeksen i den samling.

trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen kan avbrytes hvis du ikke slette en rad kan fullføres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default or user-specified value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter standard eller brukerdefinert verdi for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property, its value can change depending on the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Selv om du kan angi verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>egenskapen verdien kan endre avhengig av musepekeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property in its normal state, which is either its default value, or a value specified in code.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hente verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>egenskap i tilstanden normal, som standardverdi eller en verdi som er angitt i koden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> representing the normal value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> som representerer normal verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter det loddrette rullefeltet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> representing the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> som representerer det loddrette rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of pixels by which the control is scrolled vertically.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall piksler som kontrollen er rullet loddrett.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels by which the control is scrolled vertically.
trans-unit.target: Antall piksler som kontrollen er rullet loddrett.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you have provided your own data-management operations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du har angitt dine egne data styring for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode is designed for use with very large stores of data.
trans-unit.target: Virtuell modus er utviklet for bruk med svært butikker av data.

trans-unit.source: When the VirtualMode property is `true`, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with a set number of rows and columns and then handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to populate the cells.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen VirtualMode er `true`, du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>med et angitt antall rader og kolonner og deretter referansen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>-hendelsen for å fylle ut cellene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode requires implementation of an underlying data cache to handle the population, editing, and deletion of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cells based on actions of the user.
trans-unit.target: Virtuell modus krever implementeringen av en underliggende hurtigbuffer til å håndtere populasjon, redigering og sletting av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>celler basert på Handlinger for brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om implementering virtuelle modus [slik: Implementer virtuelle modus i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You must use virtual mode to maintain the values of unbound columns when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is in bound mode.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke virtuelle modus for å beholde verdiene for ubundet kolonner når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen er i modus for bundet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns in bound mode is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Sortering av ubundet kolonner i bundne modus støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> uses data-management operations that you provide; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> bruker dataadministrasjon operasjonen(e) du oppgi; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes window messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler vindusmeldinger.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-metoden på base klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer vinduet meldingen for å behandle.
